One tael each of licorice (roasted) and Qingpi, half a tael each of dried ginger, cinnamon, and good ginger, half a sheng of aged millet. Mix these seven ingredients into a fine powder; take ten pennyweights each time, mix with half a pennyweight of stir-fried fennel powder, and take with warm wine at any time.

Qu Mai Powder
For treating abscesses and back pain, expelling pus and relieving pain, facilitating urination. Equal parts of cassia heart, red peony root, angelica, astragalus, Qu Mai, white and licorice (roasted) with the core removed from Ophiopogon. One cup of red beans, soaked in wine and stir-fried. Crush the above ingredients, take forty pennyweights each time, decoct with wine and take warm. If the abscesses have not burst and pus and blood continue to drain with intolerable pain, add Xixin, Bai Zhi, white gentian, and Job's tears.

Ginseng and Atractylodes Powder
Two taels each of ginseng, Poria, Atractylodes (stir-fried), lotus seeds (core removed), stir-fried sand cardamom, stir-fried Job's tears, and yam; one tael each of stir-fried Platycodon, licorice (roasted), and peeled flat beans soaked in ginger juice and stir-fried. Grind these into a fine powder; take twenty pennyweights each time and decoct with Acorus calamus to consume.[451p]

　　调胃白朮散　痈疽声嘶色败，唇鼻青赤，面目浮肿，宜用。　　白朮炒　茯苓各二钱　陈皮　白芍药炒　槟榔　泽泻各一钱　木香五分　作一剂，水二锺，姜三片，煎八分，食后服。如肿不退，加白朮炒、枳实麸炒各一钱。
　　附子理中汤　治疮疡，脾胃虚寒，或误行攻伐，手足厥冷，饮食不入，或肠鸣腹痛，呕逆吐泻。　　附子　人参　茯苓　白芍药各三钱　白朮四钱　　右，水煎服。

　　姜附汤　治疮疡，真阳亏损，或误行汗下，或脓血出多，失于补托，以致上气喘急，自汗盗汗，气短头运。　　人参　附子炮制去皮脐，各一两　干姜炮　白朮各五钱　　右作二剂，水煎服。

　　参附汤　治失血过多，或脓瘀大泄，或寒凉汗下，真阳脱陷，上气喘急，自汗盗汗，气短头运等证，急服以救元气，缓则不治。　　人参一两　附子炮去皮脐，五钱
　　右，姜五片，水煎服；不应倍之。[452p]

Tuning the Stomach Bai Zhu Powder
For abscesses with hoarse voice and pallor, blue and red lips and nose, and facial swelling, this remedy is advisable.

  • Bai Zhu (prepared) 2 qian
  • Fu Ling 2 qian
  • Chen Pi 1 qian
  • Bai Shao Yao (prepared) 1 qian
  • Bing Lang 1 qian
  • Ze Xie 1 qian
  • Mu Xiang 5 fen
    Prepare as one dose, using 2 zhong of water and 3 slices of ginger, decoct until 8 parts remain, and take after meals. If swelling does not reduce, add 1 qian each of prepared Bai Zhu and fried Zhi Shi.

Fu Zi Li Zhong Decoction
Used to treat sores and ulcers, for spleen and stomach deficiency with cold, or if mistakenly purged, with cold hands and feet, inability to eat, or symptoms of bowel gurgling, abdominal pain, vomiting, and diarrhea.

  • Fu Zi 3 qian
  • Ren Shen 3 qian
  • Fu Ling 3 qian
  • Bai Shao Yao 3 qian
  • Bai Zhu 4 qian
    Decoct in water and take.

Ginger Fu Decoction
Used to treat sores and ulcers, for true yang deficiency, or if mistakenly sweated or purged, with excessive pus and blood, leading to breathlessness, self-sweating, and weak pulse.

  • Ren Shen 1 liang
  • Fu Zi (processed, peeled and navel removed) 1 liang
  • Gan Jiang (dried ginger) 5 qian
  • Bai Zhu 5 qian
    Prepare as two doses, decoct in water and take.

Shen Fu Decoction
Used for excessive blood loss, or profuse discharge of pus and blood, or after cooling with sweats, with true yang collapsing, resulting in breathlessness, self-sweating, and weak pulse. This should be taken urgently to save vital energy, as delays may result in failure to treat.

  • Ren Shen 1 liang
  • Fu Zi (processed, peeled and navel removed) 5 qian
    Prepare with 5 slices of ginger, decoct in water and take; do not double the dosage.[452p]

　　怀忠丹　治内廱有败脓败血，腥秽殊甚，以致脐腹冷痛，用此推脓下血。　　白芷　单叶红蜀葵花根各一两　白矾枯　白芍药各五钱　　右研为末，镕黄蜡丸如梧子大，空心米汤下三十丸，推脓下血，出尽后，服十宣散补之。忌发物。
　　葶苈大枣泻肺渴肺渴　治肺痈喘不得卧。　　葶苈炒黄研细如弹丸大　大枣十二枚　水三升，入枣先煮取二升，去枣人葶苈，又煮一升顿服之。又曰治肺痈，胸满胀，一身并面目浮肿，鼻塞清涕出，不知香臭酸辛，咳逆上气，喘鸣迫塞，用前方三日一剂，可至三四剂。须先与小青龙汤一剂乃与之。
　　桔梗汤　治咳而胸满，振寒脉数，咽干不渴，时出浊唾腥臭，久久吐脓如粥者，肺痈也。　　桔梗　甘草炙，各一两　用水三升，煮取一升，去滓分温再服，则吐脓血也。亦治喉痹。《三因》甘草倍之，每四钱，名四圣散。《千金》亦名桔梗汤，用桔梗三两，甘草二两，服后必吐脓血。[453p]

Huai Zhong Dan: For treating internal abscesses with pus and blood, especially with foul and putrid odors, causing cold pain in the navel and abdomen. Use this to expel pus and blood. Ingredients: One tael each of Bai Zhi and single-leaf red hibiscus root, five qian each of white alum and white peony. Grind these into a powder, melt with yellow wax to form pills the size of a wutong nut. Take thirty pills with rice soup on an empty stomach to expel pus and blood. After everything is expelled, take Shi Xuan San to supplement. Avoid pungent foods.

Ting Li Da Zao: For treating lung abscesses and thirst. Effective for lung abscess causing wheezing that prevents lying down. Ingredients: Fry Ting Li and grind finely into the size of a bullet, with twelve large jujubes. Use three sheng of water, adding the jujubes first, boil to get two sheng, then remove the jujubes and add Ting Li, boiling down to one sheng, and consume it all at once. It is also stated that for lung abscess with chest fullness and distension, body and face swelling, nasal congestion with clear mucus, unknown scents, cough, reverse Qi, and wheezing with blockage, use the previous formula once every three days, up to three or four doses. Use Xiao Qing Long Tang first before this treatment.

Jie Geng Tang: For cough with chest fullness, rapid cold pulse, dry throat without thirst, periodically producing turbid phlegm with a foul odor, and for lingering coughing up phlegm like porridge, indicating lung abscess. Ingredients: One tael each of Jie Geng and honey-fried licorice. Use three sheng of water, boil to obtain one sheng, strain and take warm to expel phlegm and blood. It also treats throat obstruction. In "San Yin," licorice is doubled at four qian each, named Si Sheng San. In "Qian Jin," it is also called Jie Geng Tang, using three taels of Jie Geng and two taels of licorice, taking it ensures expelling phlegm and blood.[453p]

　　苇茎汤　治肺痈。又云：　一本治咳，有微热烦满，心胸甲错。　　苇茎三升，切　桃仁五十枚，去皮　薏苡仁　冬瓜仁各半升　用水一斗，先煮苇茎得五升，去滓，入诸仁煮取二升，分温五服，当吐如粥。
　　如圣丸梅师　治风热毒气上攻，咽喉痛痹，肿塞妨闷；及肺痈喘嗽唾脓血，胸满振寒，咽干不渴，时出浊沫，气臭腥秽，久久咯脓，状如米粥。　　樟脑　牛黄各另研　桔梗　甘草生用，各一钱　为细末，炼蜜丸，每两作二十丸，每用一丸噙化。
　　仲景桔梗白散　治咳而胸满，振寒脉数，咽干不渴，时出浊唾腥臭，久久吐脓如米粥者，为肺痈。　　桔梗　贝母各三分　巴豆去皮炒研如脂，一分　　右三味为散，强人饮服半钱匕，羸者减之。病在膈上者吐脓血，膈下者泻出。若下多不止，饮冷水一碗则定。[454p]

Reed Stem Decoction: Treats lung abscess. It is also said: One version treats cough, with slight fever, irritability, and fullness in the chest.

Take three sheng of reed stems, chopped, fifty peach kernels, peeled, and half a sheng each of coix seeds and winter melon seeds. Use one dou of water, first boil the reed stems to obtain five sheng, remove the dregs, then add the other seeds and boil to yield two sheng. Divide into five portions, warm, and take as needed until expectoration resembles porridge.

Sheng Wan Mei Shi: Treats wind-heat toxic qi attacking upwards, causing sore and obstructed throat, swelling, and oppression; also for lung abscess with cough, expectoration of pus and blood, fullness in the chest with chills, dry throat without thirst, occasionally producing turbid foam, with foul odor, spitting pus resembling rice porridge over time.

Camphor and ox gall, each ground separately; each one qian of dried platycodon and raw licorice, ground into fine powder, mixed with honey into pills, producing twenty pills per two liang, using one pill to dissolve in the mouth.

Zhongjing's Platycodon White Powder: Treats cough with chest fullness, rapid pulse with chills, dry throat without thirst, occasionally expectorating foul-smelling turbid phlegm, and over time spitting pus resembling rice porridge, indicating lung abscess.

Three-fen each of platycodon and fritillaria, one-fen of skinless fried and ground euphorbia, constitute a powder. Strong individuals should take half a qian with water, while the weak should reduce the dose. For those with pus and blood vomit affected in the diaphragm, purge; for those with issues below the diaphragm, administer a laxative. If there is excessive purging, drinking one bowl of cold water will help to stabilize.[454p]

　　牡丹散 【《本事》】 　治肺痈吐脓血作臭，胸乳间皆痛。　　牡丹皮　赤芍药　地榆　苦梗　薏苡仁　川升麻　黄芩　生甘草各一钱半　　右作一服，水二锺，煎至一锺，食远服。　一方无黄芩，加生姜煎，名升麻汤。
　　如金解毒散　治肺痈。
　　桔梗一钱　甘草一钱半　黄连　黄芩　黄蘗　山栀并炒，各七分　作一剂，水二锺，煎八分，作十余次呷之，勿急服。
　　桔梗汤　治男妇咳而胸膈隐痛，两脚肿满，咽干口燥，烦闷多渴，时出浊唾腥臭，名曰肺痈，小便赤黄，大便多濇。　　桔梗　贝母　当归酒浸　(艹舌)蒌仁　枳壳麸炒　薏苡仁微炒　桑白皮　防己　甘草节各一两　百合蒸　黄芪各一两半北五味子　甜葶苈　地骨皮　知母　杏仁各半两　　右銼碎，每服四钱，水一盏半，生姜三片，煎七分，不拘时温服。咳者加百药煎，热加黄芩，大便不利加煨大黄少许，小便濇甚加木通、车前子煎，烦躁加白茅根煎，咳而疼甚加人参、白芷煎。[455p]

Mudan San (Peony Powder)
From: Ben Shi
Indications: Treats lung abscess with pus and blood expectoration that smells foul, chest and breast pain.
Ingredients:

  • Peony root: 1.5 qian
  • Red peony: 1.5 qian
  • Earth's cure (Diyu): 1.5 qian
  • Bitter stem: 1.5 qian
  • Coix seed (Yiyiren): 1.5 qian
  • Sichuan elevates hemp (Chuan Shengma): 1.5 qian
  • Scutellaria (Huangqin): 1.5 qian
  • Fresh licorice (Sheng Gan Cao): 1.5 qian

Preparation: Combine the above into one dose, add two sheng of water, boil down to one sheng, and take after meals. If lacking Huangqin, use fresh ginger to decoct, called Shengma Decoction.

Jin Jiedu San (Golden Detox Powder)
Indications: Treats lung abscess.
Ingredients:

  • Platycodon (Jiegeng): 1 qian
  • Licorice: 1.5 qian
  • Coptis (Huanglian): 0.7 qian
  • Scutellaria: 0.7 qian
  • Phellodendron (Huangbo): 0.7 qian
  • Gardenia (Shanzhi): 0.7 qian, stir-fried

Preparation: Combine the above into one dose, add two sheng of water, boil to eight fen, take several times gradually, do not rush.

Jiegeng Decoction
Indications: Treats cough in men and women with concealed chest pain, swollen feet, dry throat, mouth dryness, irritability alongside thirst, occasional purulent expectoration, diagnosed as lung abscess, with red-yellow urine and loose stools.
Ingredients:

  • Platycodon: 1.5 liang
  • Fritillaria: 1.5 liang
  • Angelica (Danggui): wine-soaked, 1.5 liang
  • Trichosanthes seeds (Gua Lou Ren): 1.5 liang
  • Bitter orange peel (Zhike): stir-fried, 1.5 liang
  • Coix seed: slightly stir-fried, 1.5 liang
  • Mulberry root (Sangbaipi): 1.5 liang
  • Stephania: 1.5 liang
  • Licorice (Gancao): 1.5 liang
  • Lily (Baihe): steamed, 1.5 liang
  • Astragalus (Huangqi): 1.5 liang
  • Northern five-flavor fruit (Bei Wuweizi): 0.5 liang
  • Sweet salvia (Tian Tingli): 0.5 liang
  • Rehmannia (Diguopi): 0.5 liang
  • Anemarrhena (Zhimu): 0.5 liang
  • Apricot kernel (Xingren): 0.5 liang

Preparation: Crush and grind, take four qian each dose, add one and a half sheng of water, three slices of fresh ginger, boil to seven fen, and take warm at any time. If coughing, add Baiyao decoction; if feverish, add Huangqin; if constipation, add a little stir-fried rhubarb; if urine is murky, add Muxiong and Chuqianzi decoction; if restless, add Baimaogen decoction; if cough is painful, add Ren Shen and Baizhi decoction.[455p]

　　四顺汤　治肺痈吐脓，五心烦热，壅闷咳嗽。　　贝母去心　紫菀去苗土　桔梗炒，各一两　甘草炙銼，半两　　右捣筛，每服三钱，水一盏，煎五七沸，去滓不拘时稍冷服。如咳嗽甚，加去皮尖杏仁三枚同煎。小儿量减。
　　泻白散　治肺痈。
　　桑白皮炒，二钱　地骨皮　甘草炙　贝母去心　紫菀　桔梗炒　当归酒拌，各一钱　(艹舌)蒌仁钱半　作一剂，水一锺，姜三片，煎八分，食远服。[456p]

Si Shun Decoction treats lung abscess with purulent cough, five hearts heat, and chest oppression. Use: Bai Mu (remove the core) 1 tael, Zi Wan (remove the soil from the root) 1 tael, Zhi Ke (stir-fried) 1 tael, Gan Cao (honey-fried and chopped) ½ tael. Mash and strain; take 3 qian per dose, boil in 1 cup of water until 5-7 bubbles form, discard the residue and cool slightly before taking. If the cough is severe, add 3 peeled and pointed apricot kernels to boil together. Dosage for children should be reduced.

Xie Bai Powder treats lung abscess. Use: Sang Bai Pi (stir-fried) 2 qian, Di Guo Pi, Gan Cao (honey-fried), Bai Mu (remove the core), Zi Wan, Zhi Ke (stir-fried), Dang Gui mixed with wine, each 1 qian; (Cao She) Lou Ren ½ qian. Prepare as one dose using 1 ding of water with 3 slices of ginger, boil down to 8 parts, take after meals.[456p]

　　济生排脓汤　治肺痈得吐脓后，以此排脓补肺。　　生绵黄芪二两细末，每二钱，水一碗煎五分服　肺痈收敛疮口，止有合欢树皮、白蔹煎汤饮之。
　　排脓散　治肺痈吐脓后，宜服此补肺。　　黄芪盐水拌炒　白芷　五味炒杵　人参各等分　为细末，每服三钱，食后蜜汤调下。
　　宁肺汤　治咳嗽唾脓自汗，上气喘急，用此补肺；及治荣卫俱虚，发热自汗。　　人参　当归酒拌　白朮　熟地黄　川芎　白芍药　甘草炙　五味子捣　麦门冬去心　桑白皮炙　阿胶蛤粉炒　白茯苓各一钱　作一剂，水二锺，姜二片，煎八分，食后服。
　　人参补肺汤　治肺证咳喘短气；或肾水不足，虚火上炎，痰涎壅盛；或吐脓血，发热作渴，小便短濇。　　人参　黄芪蜜炙　白朮土炒　白茯苓　陈皮　当归各一钱　山萸　山药各二钱　麦冬七分　甘草炙　五味子各五分　熟地黄自制，一钱半　牡丹皮八分　　右，姜枣水煎服。[457p]

Jisheng Pai Nao Decoction: Treats lung abscess after expelling pus; use this to discharge pus and nourish the lungs. Take two liang of raw Astragalus in fine powder; each dose is two qian, boiled with one bowl of water for five minutes, to be taken. For lung abscess healing of wounds, drink a decoction with the bark of the combined tree and white vine.

Pailing Powder: Treats lung abscess after expelling pus; it is advisable to take this to nourish the lungs. Mix and fry Astragalus with salt water, white angelica, five flavors, ginseng, each in equal parts, grind to fine powder; take three qian per dose, mixed with honey water after meals.

Ning Lung Decoction: Treats coughing with pus and excessive sweating from Qi deficiency and shortness of breath; this nourishes the lungs, and also treats both nourishment and defense deficiency, leading to fever and spontaneous sweating. Ingredients include ginseng, wine-mixed angelica, white atractylodes, cooked rehmannia, chuanxiong, white peony, honey-fried licorice, crushed five-flavor fruit, winter melon heart removed, fried mulberry white skin, fried ejiao with clam powder, and white poria, each one qian; prepare into one dose with two sheng of water and two slices of ginger, simmer for eight minutes and take after meals.

Ginseng Lung Nourishing Decoction: Treats lung conditions such as coughing and shortness of breath; or insufficient kidney water, with excess fire and phlegm retention; or vomiting pus and blood, with fever and thirst, and short urination. Ingredients include ginseng, honey-roasted Astragalus, soil-fried white atractylodes, white poria, dried tangerine peel, each one qian; mountain fruit and mountain yam each two qian; seven fen of winter melon, honey-fried licorice, five-flavor fruit each five fen; one and a half qian of self-prepared cooked rehmannia; eight fen of peony root. Prepare with ginger, jujube, and water to decoct and take.[457p]

　　人参平肺散　治心火克肺，传为疽瘘，咳嗽喘呕，痰涎壅盛，胸膈痞满，咽嗌不利。若因肝木太过而致，当补肺；若因肾水不足而患，当补脾肺；若因心火旺而自病，当利小便。　　人参　陈皮　甘草炙　地骨皮　茯苓各一钱　知母炒，七分　五味子杵炒，四分　天门冬去心　青皮各五分　桑白皮炒，一钱　　右，水煎服。

　　参芪补脾汤　治肺疽，脾气亏损，久咳吐脓涎，或中满不食，必服此药补脾土，以生肺金，否则不治。　　人参　白朮各二钱　黄芪二钱五分　茯苓　陈皮　当归各一钱　升麻三分　麦门冬七分　五味子四分　桔梗六分　甘草炙，五分　　右，姜枣水煎服。

　　葶苈散　治肺痈，咳嗽气急，睡卧不安，心胸胀满。　　甜葶苈子二两半，隔纸炒至赤色　百合炒　白附子　北五味炒　甘草节　人参　(艹款)冬花　百药煎　紫菀去木，各一两　大朱砂半两，另研　　右为末，每服二钱，灯心汤调下。[458p]

Ginseng Pulmonary Powder
Treats heart fire affecting the lungs, manifested as sores and fistulas, cough, wheezing, vomiting, excessive phlegm, chest fullness, and throat discomfort. If caused by excessive liver wood, support the lungs; if due to insufficient kidney water, support the spleen and lungs; if due to strong heart fire, promote urination.
Ingredients:

  • Ginseng: 1 qian
  • Dried tangerine peel: 1 qian
  • Honey-fried licorice: 1 qian
  • Rehmannia root: 1 qian
  • Poria: 1 qian
  • Fried Anemarrhena: 7 fen
  • Fried Schisandra: 4 fen
  • Asparagus: 5 fen (heart removed)
  • Aged tangerine peel: 5 fen
  • Fried mulberry bark: 1 qian
    Prepare by decocting with water.

Ginseng and Astragalus Spleen Tonic
Treats pulmonary abscess, spleen qi deficiency, chronic cough with purulent sputum, or fullness and lack of appetite. This medicine must be taken to tonify the spleen earth, thereby nourishing the lung metal; otherwise, it will not be treated.
Ingredients:

  • Ginseng: 2 qian
  • White atractylodes: 2 qian
  • Astragalus: 2.5 qian
  • Poria: 1 qian
  • Dried tangerine peel: 1 qian
  • Angelica: 1 qian
  • Cimicifuga: 3 fen
  • Asparagus: 7 fen
  • Schisandra: 4 fen
  • Platycodon: 6 fen
  • Honey-fried licorice: 5 fen
    Prepare by decocting with ginger and jujube water.

Ting Li Powder
Treats lung furuncles, coughing with shortness of breath, unrest during sleep, and chest fullness.
Ingredients:

  • Sweet Ting Li seeds: 2.5 liang, stir-fried until red
  • Fried lily: 1 liang
  • White prepared aconite: 1 liang
  • Northern schisandra: 1 liang
  • Licorice stems: 1 liang
  • Ginseng: 1 liang
  • (Coriander) Winter flower: 1 liang
  • All herbs: 1 liang
  • Big vermilion: 0.5 liang, ground separately
    These ingredients should be powdered; take 2 qian each time, mixed with lantern heart decoction.[458p]

　　补肺散　治肺痈，已吐出脓血，以此润护。　　真锺乳粉一两　白滑石二两
　　右研细，每服三钱，米饮调下。

　　理肺膏　治肺痈正作，咳唾不利，胸膈迫塞。　　诃子去核　百药煎　五味子微炒　条参去芦　(艹款)冬花蕊　杏仁　知母　贝母　甜葶苈子　紫菀　百合　甘草节各五钱　　右为末，用白茅根净洗，称三斤，研取自然汁，入磁石器中熬成膏；更添入好蜜二两，再熬匀，后调和前药为圆如梧子大，温水吞下。
　　五香白朮散　宽中和气，滋益脾土，生肺金，进美饮食。　　沉香　木香　明乳香　丁香　藿香叶各半两　白朮　人参　白茯苓　薏苡仁　山药　扁豆　桔梗　缩砂　白豆蔻　粉草　莲肉各一两　　右为末，苏盐汤调，空心服；枣汤亦可。有汗，加浮麦煎汤下。[459p]

Bupleurum Powder: Treats lung abscess with expectoration of pus and blood, to provide moisture and protection. Ingredients: 1 liang of true bellflower powder, 2 liang of white smooth stone. Grind finely and take 3 qian each time, mixed with rice drink.

Lung Regulating Ointment: Treats lung abscess that is newly formed, causing coughing with difficulty in expectoration, and chest tightness. Ingredients: Remove pits from Ḥezi, prepare herbal decoction, lightly fry Schisandra, remove the root from Dangshen, winter flower stigma, apricot kernel, biếtmù, lily, sweet glycyrrhiza tail, purple aster, each 5 qian. Grind into powder, wash 3 Jin of white reed root thoroughly, extract natural juice, place in a ceramic vessel and boil into ointment; then add 2 liang of quality honey, boil again to mix, and finally adjust with previous herbs into rounds the size of a jujube, swallow with warm water.

Five-Spice Atractylodes Powder: Relaxes the stomach and harmonizes qi, benefits the spleen, generates lung vitality, enhances food and drink. Ingredients: 5 qian each of agarwood, wood fragrance, bright frankincense, clove, and patchouli leaf; 1 liang each of Atractylodes, ginseng, white Poria, Job’s tears, Chinese yam, coix seed, platycodon, and white cardamom. Grind into powder, mix with saltwater or jujube tea and take on an empty stomach; if sweating occurs, add floating wheat decoction.[459p]

　　薏苡附子散　治身甲错，腹皮急，如腹胀本无积聚，身热脉数者。　　附子炮，二分　败酱五分　薏苡仁一钱　　右为末，每服方寸匕，以水二合煎顿服，小便当下。《三因》薏苡、附子同前，败酱用一两一分，每四钱，水盏半，煎七分，去渣，空心服。
　　牡丹汤　治肠痈，小腹肿痞，按之即痛，小便如淋，时时发热，自汗恶寒，其脉迟紧者，脓未成，可下之，当有血；洪数者脓已成，不可下。　　牡丹皮　(艹舌)蒌仁各一钱　桃仁去皮尖双仁　芒硝各二钱　大黄五钱　　右作一服，水二锺，煎至一锺，去滓，入硝再煎数沸，不拘时服。
　　薏苡仁汤　治肠痈腹中(疒丂 )痛，烦躁不安，或胀满不食，小便濇。妇人产后虚热，多有此病，纵非痈，但疑似间便可服。　　薏苡仁　(艹舌)蒌仁各三钱　牡丹皮　桃仁各二钱　　右作一服，水二锺，煎至一锺，不拘时服。[460p]

Yi Yi Fu Zi San: Treats intercostal pain, abdominal tension, as if the abdomen is bloated without accumulation, with body heat and rapid pulse. Prepare: 2 parts Fu Zi roasted; 5 parts Bai Jiang; 1 part Yi Yi Ren. Grind to a fine powder. Take a spoonful with 2 parts water, decoct and take in one dose. Urination should occur. For San Yin, use Yi Yi and Fu Zi as before, but use 1.1 parts Bai Jiang, 4 parts water in a cup, decoct to 7 parts, strain, and take on an empty stomach.

Mu Dan Tang: Treats intestinal abscess, swollen lower abdomen, pain upon pressure, urination like strangulation, intermittent fever, spontaneous sweating and aversion to cold. For a sluggish and tense pulse, if pus is not yet formed, it can be drained, but blood should be present; with a sometimes rapid pulse, pus has formed, and drainage is not advised. Ingredients: 1 part Mu Dan Pi, 1 part Lou Ren, 2 parts Tao Ren (peeled and tips removed), 2 parts Mang Xiao, and 5 parts Da Huang. Prepare as one dose, using 2 cups water, decoct to 1 cup, strain, add Mang Xiao and decoct again until boiling, taken without time restrictions.

Yi Yi Ren Tang: Treats intestinal abscess with abdominal pain, anxiety, possible fullness, and poor appetite, along with turbid urination. This often occurs in women after childbirth due to vacuity heat, and even if it's not an abscess, it can be taken if symptoms are suspected. Ingredients: 3 parts Yi Yi Ren, 3 parts Lou Ren, 2 parts Mu Dan Pi, and 2 parts Tao Ren. Prepare as one dose, using 2 cups water, decoct to 1 cup, taken without time restrictions.[460p]

　　牡丹散　治肠痈冷证，腹濡而痛，时时利脓。　　牡丹皮　人参　天麻　白茯苓　黄芪　木香　当归　川芎　官桂　桃仁去皮炒，各七钱半　白芷　薏苡仁　甘草炙，各五钱　为细末，每服三钱，用水一锺，煎至七分，食前温服。
　　梅仁汤　治肠痈，里急隐痛，大便秘濇。　　梅核仁四十九粒，去皮尖　大黄三两　牡丹皮一两七钱半　芒硝二两半　冬瓜仁四两　犀角镑，一两半　　右銼如麻豆大，每服五钱，水二盏，煎至一盏，去滓温服，以利下脓血三两行为度。
　　四圣散 治肠痈痈疽，生于脑髭背腋乳，便毒服之神效。　　生黄(艹舌)蒌一枚，去皮　粉草四钱研末　没药研末 三钱　乳香研末一钱　　右用好红酒二大碗，慢火煎至一碗，分作两服，两日服尽。大便顺导恶物，妙。若干(艹舌)蒌，则用两枚。　　一方若病在上，食后服。病在下，食前服毒已结成，即脓化为水。毒未成，即于小便中出。疾甚，再合服以退为度。[461p]

Mu Dan San: Treats intestinal abscess with cold symptoms, resulting in moist and painful abdomen, with occasional purulent diarrhea. Ingredients: 7.5 qian each of Mu Dan Pi, Ren Shen, Tian Ma, Bai Fu Ling, Huang Qi, Mu Xiang, Dang Gui, Chuan Xiong, Guan Gui, and peeled and stir-fried Tao Ren; 5 qian each of Bai Zhi, Yi Yi Ren, and honey-fried Gan Cao. Grind into a fine powder. For each dose, take 3 qian, mix with one bowl of water, boil down to seven-tenths, and take warm before meals.

Mei Ren Tang: Treats intestinal abscess, with urgent internal pain and constipation. Ingredients: 49 peeled Mei He kernels, 6 taels of Da Huang, 1 tael and 7.5 qian of Mu Dan Pi, 2.5 taels of Mang Xiao, 4 taels of Dong Gua Ren, and 1.5 taels of powdered Rhino horn. Grind all ingredients to the size of mung beans. For each dose, take 5 qian, boil with 2 cups of water down to 1 cup, strain, and take warm to induce the elimination of pus and blood.

Si Sheng San: Treats intestinal abscess and sores, particularly effective for conditions affecting the hair on the back of the neck, armpits, and breasts. Ingredients: 1 piece of raw Huang (Chao She) Lou, peeled; 4 qian of powdered grass; 3 qian of powdered Myrrh; and 1 qian of powdered Frankincense. Mix with 2 large bowls of good red wine, simmer down to one bowl, and divide into two doses to be consumed over two days. This will facilitate bowel movements and expel harmful substances. If needing more Huang Lou, use two pieces.

For conditions above, take after meals; for those below, take before meals. If the poison has solidified, it will turn purulent like water. If it has not solidified, it will be expelled through urination. If the illness is severe, take additional doses as needed to alleviate symptoms.[461p]

　　大黄汤　治肠痈小腹坚鞕，肿大如掌而热，按之则痛，其上色或赤或白，小便稠数，汗出憎寒，其脉迟紧者未成脓，如脉数则脓已成。　　大黄銼炒　牡丹皮　硝石研　芥子　桃仁汤浸去皮尖双仁炒，各半两　　右銼碎，每服五钱，水二盏，煎至一盏，去渣，空心温服，以利下脓血为度，未利再服。
　　排脓散　治肠痈小腹胀痛，脉滑数，或里急后重，或时时下血。　　黄芪盐水拌炒　当归酒拌　金银花　白芷　穿山甲用蛤粉炒　防风　连翘　(艹舌)蒌仁杵　甘草各一钱　作一剂，水二锺，煎八分，食前服。若脓将尽，去穿山甲、连翘，加当归、川芎，或为末，每服三钱，食后蜜汤调下亦可。
　　射干汤　治胃脘痈，人迎脉逆而盛，嗽脓血，荣卫不流，热聚胃口成痈　　射干去毛　栀仁　赤茯苓去皮　升麻各一两　赤芍药一两半　白朮半两　　右为末，每服五钱，水二盏，煎至一盏，去渣，入地黄汁一合、蜜半合，再煎温服，不计时候。[462p]

Da Huang Decoction: For treating intestinal abscess, with hard and swollen lower abdomen, the swelling as big as a palm and hot to the touch, painful upon pressure, with the color being either red or white. The urine is thick and frequent, sweating occurs with aversion to cold. If the pulse is slow and tight, pus has not yet formed; if the pulse is rapid, pus has formed.

Ingredients: Da Huang (dried rhubarb), Bai Shao (white peony root), Nitre (saltpeter) ground, Jiejiezi (mustard seed), Tao Ren (apricot kernel, peeled and pan-fried, removing the tip and double kernels), each half a “liang” (about 15 grams). Crush the above ingredients; take five qian (about 15 grams) with two bowls of water, decoct until one bowl remains, strain, and take on an empty stomach warm, to facilitate the discharge of pus and blood. If not effective, take again.

Pus Expelling Powder: For treating intestinal abscess with abdominal distension and pain, with slippery and rapid pulse, possibly urgency and heaviness in the lower abdomen, or occasional blood discharge.

Ingredients: Huang Qi (astragalus) stir-fried with salt water, Dang Gui (angelica) stir-fried with liquor, Jin Yin Hua (honeysuckle), Bai Zhi (white angelica), Chuan Shan Jia (pangolin) stir-fried with clam powder, Fang Feng (siler), Lian Qiao (forsythia), accumulated root powder, and Gan Cao (licorice), each one qian. Prepare as one dose, with two bowls of water, decoct to eight parts, and take before meals. If pus is nearly discharged, remove pangolin and forsythia, add more Dang Gui and Chuan Xiong (szechwan lovage root), or grind into powder, taking three qian after meals mixed with honey water.

She Gan Decoction: For treating gastric abscess, with the pulse at the human response location being rebellious and vigorous, coughing up pus and blood, disorder of defense and nutrient not flowing, heat accumulating causing abscess in the stomach.

Ingredients: She Gan (belamcanda), hair removed, Zhi Zi (gardenia fruit), Chi Fu Ling (red poria) skin removed, Sheng Ma (black cohosh) each one liang, Chi Shao (red peony root) one and a half liang, Bai Zhu (white atractylodes) half a liang.

Crush to powder; take five qian with two bowls of water, decoct until one bowl remains, strain, then add one “he” (about 10 grams) of fresh Rehmannia juice and half “he” of honey, decoct again and take warm, no need to worry about timing.[462p]

　　复元通气散 【《精要》】 　治诸气濇耳聋，腹痈便痈，疮疽无头，止痛消肿。　　青皮　陈皮各四两　甘草三寸，生熟各半　穿山甲炮　(艹舌)蒌根各二两　金银花净者　连翘各一两　　右为细末，热酒调下。

　　芍药汤　治胃脘积热，结聚为痈。
　　赤芍药　石膏　犀角镑　麦门冬　荠苨　木通各二两　(石卜)硝　升麻　元参　甘草各一两　　右(口父)咀，每服五钱，水一盏半，煎八分，去滓，不拘时温服。
　　荆防败毒散　治疔疮。
　　黄连　羌活　青皮　白僵蚕　独活　防风　蝉蜕　细辛　赤芍药　甘草节　独脚茅各等分　　右(口父)咀，每服五钱。先将一服入泽兰叶少许，姜十钱重，同擂烂，热酒和服；然后用酒水各半盏，姜三片煎服。病势退减后，再加大黄少许，煎服，略下一二行，荡去余毒，更用白梅、苍耳子，研烂贴疮上，拔去根脚。加鲜菊花捣汁入药尤妙。[463p]

Fuyuantongqi Powder

Treats various qi stagnations, ear deafness, abdominal abscess, constipation, and sores without a head, alleviates pain and reduces swelling. Ingredients: 4 taels of Qingpi (green tangerine peel) and Chenpi (aged tangerine peel), 3 inches of licorice, each half raw and cooked, 2 taels each of burnt pangolin shell and Luogen (tuber of Trichosanthes), 1 tael each of purified honeysuckle and Forsythia. Grind them into a fine powder and mix with hot wine to take.

Shaoyao Decoction

Treats accumulated heat in the stomach that forms abscesses. Ingredients: 2 taels each of red peony root, gypsum, powdered rhinoceros horn, Mai Men Dong (Ophiopogon tuber), and wood caulis, 1 tael each of Sha Lu (plantago) and licorice. Grind, take 5 qian, with 1.5 bowls of water, decoct to 80%, remove residue, and take warm at any time.

Jingfang Baidu Powder

Treats boils and carbuncles. Ingredients: equal parts of Huanglian (coptis), Qianghuo (notopterygium), Qingpi (green tangerine peel), white silkworm, Duhuo (angelica), Fangfeng (siler), cicada molting, Xixin (asari), red peony root, and licorice root. Grind, take 5 qian, first mixing with a small amount of Ze lan (plant), 10 qian of ginger, and pound together, taking with hot wine; then use half a bowl of wine and water, with 3 slices of ginger for decoction. After symptoms reduce, add a little Dahuang (rhubarb) and decoct again, letting out one or two lines of purulent matter to eliminate residual toxins. Further apply crushed white plum and Cang’erzi (xanthium) on the sores, pulling out the roots. Adding fresh chrysanthemum juice into the medicine is especially effective.[463p]

　　二活散
　　羌活　独活　当归　乌药　赤芍药　金银花　连翘　天花粉　甘草节　白芷各四钱半　红花　苏木　荆芥　蝉蜕　干葛各三钱　檀香二钱　　右为细末，每服三钱，煎苍耳汤调下。
　　夺命丹　治疔疮发恶心，及诸恶疮。　　蟾酥干者，半钱，酒化　朱砂水飞，三钱　枯矾　寒水石水飞，各一钱　轻粉五分　铜绿一字　麝香一字　海羊二十个，研。即蜗牛也。不用亦效　　右件为细末，将海羊另研为泥，和药一处，丸如菉豆大。如丸不就，加好酒成之。病轻者一丸、二丸，重者三丸。未效再服。服时嚼葱白一大口，极烂，置手心，放药丸于葱内裹合，热酒送下，暖处卧取汗出为效。忌冰水。薛氏有铜绿、麝香、没药、乳香各一钱。[464p]

Er Huo San

Qianghuo, Duhuo, Danggui, Wuyao, Chishaoyao, Jinyinhua, Lianqiao, Tianhuafen, Gancaojie, Baizhi, each 4.5 qian; Honghua, Sumu, Jingjie, Chantui, and Gange, each 3 qian; Tansang 2 qian. The above ingredients should be ground to a fine powder. Take 3 qian each time and brew with Canger soup for ingestion.

Duo Ming Dan

Used for treating sores that cause nausea and various severe ulcers. Dried toad venom, 0.5 qian, dissolved in wine; Zhusha water, 3 qian; Kufu, and Hanshuishi water, each 1 qian; Qingfen, 0.5 qian; Tonglu, and Musk, each a character in weight; Sea sheep 20 pieces, ground (this refers to snails). Not using it also works. The above ingredients should be ground to a fine powder, and the sea sheep should be separately ground into a paste. Combine with the powder to form pills the size of soybeans. If the pills do not form, add good wine to make them. The light cases should take 1 to 2 pills, while heavier cases should take 3 pills. If ineffective, take again. While taking, chew a large mouthful of scallion white until very mushy, place in the palm of your hand, wrap the medicine pill in it, and swallow with hot wine, then lie down in a warm place to induce sweating for effect. Avoid ice-cold water. Xue Shi has Tonglu, Musk, Myrrh, and Frankincense, each 1 qian.[464p]

　　返魂丹 【《瑞竹》】 　治十三种疔。　　朱砂　胆矾各一两半　血竭　铜绿　雄黄　蜗牛生用　枯白矾各一两　轻粉　没药　蟾酥各半两　麝香少许　　右将蜗牛、蟾酥研烂，余药为细末，同研和丸如鸡头大，每服一丸。令病人先嚼葱白三寸，吐在手心，将药丸裹在葱白内，用热酒一盏吞下，如重车行五里许，有汗出即瘥。如不能嚼葱，研烂裹下极效。
　　返魂丹　经云：汗之则疮愈。必用此药汗之。　　乳香　没药　辰砂　雄黄各一钱半　轻粉　片脑　麝香各五分　蜗牛不拘多少　蟾酥　青黛　粉草　硼砂各一钱　　右为细末，用海羊捣膏为丸，如难丸，加酒面糊些少，丸如弹子大，每服一丸，兼生葱头二三个，细嚼咽下。疔肿及痈肿毒气入膈者，得微汗即解。　一方加铜绿、寒水石、轻粉、枯矾各一钱。[465p]

Return of the Soul Elixir

This treats thirteen types of carbuncles.

Ingredients:

  • Realgar (朱砂) - 1.5 taels
  • Copper sulfate (胆矾) - 1.5 taels
  • Dragons’ blood (血竭) - 1 tael
  • Verdigris (铜绿) - 1 tael
  • Realgar (雄黄) - 1 tael
  • Fresh snails (蜗牛生用) - 1 tael
  • Dried white alum (枯白矾) - 1 tael
  • Light powder (轻粉) - 0.5 tael
  • Myrrh (没药) - 0.5 tael
  • Toad venom (蟾酥) - 0.5 tael
  • Musk (麝香) - a small amount

Preparation: Grind the fresh snails and toad venom into a paste, then mix the rest of the ingredients into a fine powder, combining them well. Form into pills the size of a chicken's head. The patient should first chew three inches of scallion white, spit it into the palm of their hand, then wrap the pill in the scallion and swallow it with a cup of warm wine. If they sweat, the ailment will heal. If unable to chew the scallion, grind it into a paste for use instead.

The elixir states: "If they sweat, the wound heals. This medicine must induce sweat."

Additional ingredients:

  • Frankincense (乳香) - 1.5 qian
  • Myrrh (没药) - 1.5 qian
  • Cinnabar (辰砂) - 1.5 qian
  • Realgar (雄黄) - 1.5 qian
  • Light powder (轻粉) - 0.5 qian
  • Aconite (片脑) - 0.5 qian
  • Musk (麝香) - 0.5 qian
  • Fresh snails (蜗牛) - as needed
  • Toad venom (蟾酥) - 1 qian
  • Indigo (青黛) - 1 qian
  • Powdered herbs (粉草) - 1 qian
  • Borax (硼砂) - 1 qian

Preparation: Grind into a fine powder, use sheep's gall to make into pills. If difficult to form into pills, add a little wine to make a paste. Form pills the size of a marble. Each dose consists of one pill, along with two or three fresh scallions, chewed thoroughly and swallowed. For carbuncles, abscesses, or when toxins invade the diaphragm, a slight sweat will relieve the symptoms.

An alternate prescription adds:

  • Verdigris, cold water stone, light powder, and dried alum, each at 1 qian.[465p]

　　飞龙夺命丹　治疔疮、发背、脑疽、乳痈疽、附骨疽，一切无头肿毒恶疮，服之便有头，不痛者服之便痛，已成者服之立愈。此乃恶证药中至宝，病危者服之立安矣，万无一失。此乃家传之秘方，不敢轻泄。神速之验，即日立效。　　轻粉　脑子无亦可　麝香各半钱　寒水石　血竭　胆矾各一钱　蟾酥干者酒化　乳香　没药　朱砂为衣　铜绿各二钱雄黄三钱　蜗牛二十一个，无亦效　蜈蚣一条，酒炙黄去头足　　右为细末，先将海羊连壳研为泥，和前药为丸如菉豆大，如丸不就，入酒打面糊为丸，每服二丸。[466p]

Feilong Du Ming Dan treats carbuncles, back boils, brain abscesses, breast abscesses, and bone abscesses, as well as all kinds of headless tumors and malignant sores. Taking it will promptly produce a head; if it is painless, taking it will induce pain; if already formed, taking it will lead to immediate healing. This is a treasure among medicines for serious ailments, and those in critical condition will find peace upon taking it, with no risk of failure. This is a family-secret recipe that cannot be lightly disclosed. It acts with divine speed and will be effective the same day.

Ingredients include:

  • 1/2 qian of finely powdered light mineral
  • 1/2 qian of musk
  • 1 qian of cold-water stone
  • 1 qian of blood-stopping resin
  • 1 qian of copper arsenate
  • 1 qian of dried toad essence processed with wine
  • 1 qian of frankincense
  • 1 qian of myrrh
  • 1 qian of cinnabar for coating
  • 2 qian of copper green
  • 3 qian of orpiment
  • 21 snails, or none will also be effective
  • 1 centipede, roasted in wine until the head and feet are removed.

Grind all the above into fine powder. First, mix the sea sheep whole with the shell into a paste, combine it with the previously mentioned ingredients, and shape it into pills the size of a mung bean. If the pills do not hold their shape, use wine to bind them into a paste, then form the pills, taking two at a time.[466p]

先用葱白三寸，令病人嚼烂，吐于手心，男左女右，将药丸裹在葱白内，用无灰热酒三四盏送下，于避风处，以衣盖覆之，约人行五里之久，再用热酒数杯以助药力，发热大汗出为度。初觉，二丸即消。如汗不出，重者再服二丸，汗出即效。三五日病重者，再进二丸，即愈。如疔疮走黄过心者，难治之，汗出冷者亦死矣。如病人不能嚼葱，擂碎裹药丸在内，热酒送下。疮在上，食后服；疮在下，食前服。服此药后，忌冷水、黄瓜、茄子、油腻猪鸡鱼肉湿面，一切发风发疮毒类之物，不可食之。又忌妇人洗换。狐臭，百发百中。此药活人多矣。
　　走马赴筵丹　治疔疮。
　　片脑一分　没药　乳香　硼砂　硇砂　雄黄　轻粉各三钱　麝香少许　　右为细末，蟾酥汁和为丸如黄米大，每服一丸，温酒送下。[467p]

First, use three inches of scallion white, have the patient chew it thoroughly and spit it into the palm of their hand. Men should use the left side and women the right. Wrap the medicinal pellets in the scallion white and swallow them down with three to four cups of warm, ash-free wine. Then, take shelter from the wind and cover the patient with clothing. After about five miles of walking, take several cups of hot wine to enhance the effects of the medicine, prompting warmth and profuse sweating. At first, the two pills will dissolve. If sweating does not occur, in severe cases, take another two pills; sweating will indicate efficacy. If the illness is severe after three to five days, take another two pills to achieve recovery. If there are deep sores that turn yellow and reach the heart, they are difficult to treat, and if sweating occurs and turns cold, it could be fatal. If the patient cannot chew the scallion, crush it, wrap the pills inside, and swallow it down with hot wine. If the sores are above, take the medicine after meals; if below, take it before meals. After consuming this medicine, avoid cold water, cucumbers, eggplants, greasy pig, chicken, fish, meat, wet flour, and all wind-triggering or sore-causing substances. Additionally, avoid women washing or changing clothes. This remedy works reliably for fox odor and is highly effective. This medicine has saved many lives.

The "Riding Horse to Feast Dan" treats sores and abscesses.
Use one part of powdered brain, myrrh, frankincense, borax, realgar, levigated sulfur, and a small amount of musk, each three qian. Grind these into a fine powder, and mix with toad secretion to form round pills the size of yellow millet. Take one pill with warm wine.[467p]

　　罗氏破棺丹　治疮气入腹危者。
　　大黄二两，半生半熟　甘草　芒硝各一两　　右为细末，炼蜜丸如弹子大，每服半丸，食后温酒化下，或童溺半盏研化之。忌冷水。
　　破棺丹
　　山栀　牵牛末　大黄各一两　甘草　京三棱炮，各七钱　　右炼蜜丸如弹子大，酒化服之。　一方有当归、赤芍、连翘、牡蛎、金银花、紫花地丁，宜选用之。
　　内托连翘散　疔疮出时，皮色不变，及不疼痛，按摇不动，身发寒热，便是此疮。有水疔、鱼脐疔、紫燕疔、火疔诸般疔疮。如疮黄，于黄上用针刺，仍服内托散，自然消散。　　连翘　白芷　干生地黄　赤芍药各一两　大黄去皮　山栀去顶蒂　薄荷叶各七钱　(石卜)硝二两　黄芩去心，半两　甘草一两半　　右为粗末，每服一两，水一碗，灯心竹叶煎七分。其人喘，加人参少许。大病只三四服愈。如服了心烦呕，用不二散止之。[468p]

Luo's Broken Coffin Pill
For treating wounds when air enters the abdomen and poses danger.
Two liang of rhubarb, half raw and half cooked, one liang each of licorice and mirabilite. Grind the right ingredients into a fine powder, and make pills the size of a bullet with honey. Take half a pill with warm wine after meals, or dissolve it in half a cup of urine. Avoid cold water.

Broken Coffin Pill
One liang each of gardenia, bindweed powder, and rhubarb; seven qian each of licorice and Jing sanling. Grind the ingredients into pills the size of a bullet, and take them with wine. Another formula includes Angelica, red peony, forsythia, oyster shell, honeysuckle, and purple flower plantain, which should be selectively used.

Internal Forsythia Powder
For abscesses when they appear, without color change in the skin, and no pain, they won't move when pressed, accompanied by chills and fever. This indicates the presence of the abscess. There are various types such as water abscess, fish navel abscess, purple swallow abscess, fire abscess, etc. If the abscess turns yellow, prick it with a needle, then take the internal forsythia powder; it will naturally dissipate. The formula includes one liang each of forsythia, angelica, dried raw rehmannia, and red peony; seven qian each of rhubarb (peeling it first), gardenia (removing the crown and stem), and mint leaves; two liang of mirabilite; half a liang of bitter honeysuckle (removing the core); and one and a half liang of licorice. Grind into a coarse powder, take one liang with a bowl of water, decoct with lamp wick and bamboo leaves for seven minutes. If the person is wheezing, add a little ginseng. Severe cases may require only three to four doses for recovery. If taking it leads to heart distress or vomiting, use the Er'er's Powder to alleviate it.[468p]

　　不二散
　　甘草半两　菉豆粉一两
　　右为末，分作二服，酸虀水下。

　　夺命丹　治疔疮大便秘实不通者，或心腹痛者。　　巴豆去壳　大黄各一钱　轻粉二分　郁金　雄黄　乳香各五分　朱砂　黄丹各三分　麝香少许　蟾酥不拘多少　　右末，面糊为丸如菉豆大，随虚实服之，茶清送下五七丸至九丸止，以利为度。如无此丸，以雄黄丸代之。
　　雄黄丸　治证如前。
　　巴豆十四粒　麝香少许　全蝎　牙皂　雄黄　大黄　郁金各一钱　　右末，米糊丸如菉豆大，朱砂为衣，每服五七丸，清茶送下，以利为度。
　　追毒丸
　　海浮石烧赤酢淬七次，半两　川乌一两　乳香　没药各一钱　巴豆四十九粒　　右为末，酢糊丸如桐子大。若患二三日，服十丸；五六日服十四丸，随病上下服之。先吃冷酒半盏或一盏，又用冷酒吞下。如呕不妨，出药依上服之。病人大便不动，再用三丸。如疔看得端的，爪破用头垢涂患处，后服药。[469p]

Non-Two Powder
Half a tael of licorice, one tael of mung bean powder.
Grind these into a powder, divide into two doses, take with sour rice water.

Deadly Pill
For treating boils and constipation with hard stools, or abdominal pain.
One qian of peeled white flower seed, one qian of rhubarb, two fen of light powder, five fen each of safflower, realgar, and frankincense, three fen each of cinnabar and yellow dye, a small amount of musk, and as much toad venin as needed.
Grind these into a powder, mix with dough to form pills the size of mung beans. Take five to seven pills up to nine, with tea to promote bowel movement. If these pills are unavailable, substitute with realgar pills.

Realgar Pill
For the same symptoms as above.
Fourteen pieces of white flower seed, a small amount of musk, scorpion, tooth soap, realgar, rhubarb, and safflower, each one qian.
Grind these into a powder, form pills the size of mung beans with rice paste, coat with cinnabar, and take five to seven pills with clear tea to promote bowel movement.

Chasing Poison Pill
Burn half a tael of sea-floating stone with vinegar seven times, one tael of Cao Wu, and one qian each of frankincense and myrrh, forty-nine pieces of white flower seed.
Grind these into a powder, form pills the size of tung seeds. If the illness has lasted two or three days, take ten pills; if five or six days, take fourteen pills, adjusting according to the illness's severity.
First, drink half a cup or a full cup of cold wine, then swallow with cold wine. If there is vomiting, it is fine; continue taking the medicine as described. If the patient’s bowel movements do not occur, take three more pills. If there is a clear boil, pierce it and apply the head’s grease to the affected area before taking the medicine.[469p]

　　五圣散　治疔疮。
　　皂角针二两　(艹舌)蒌一个　大黄　金银花　生姜　甘草各一两　　右(口父)咀，用好酒二升，同煎至八分，去渣，不拘时温服。
　　夺命返魂散　治一切疔疮憎寒发热，昏闷不语，肿遍皮肤，不思饮食。　　大黄　连翘　山栀子以上各二钱半，研为细末　巴豆　杏仁各二钱，麸皮同炒黑色，研为细末　人言五钱，用大蒜五个，去心填入人言，同烧过性，研为末　牵牛头末　苦丁香各一钱　　右为细末研匀，每服半钱，病重者服一钱，用新汲井华水调下，一服见效。如病重无脉者，吃下药约一顿饭时吐了药，便医不得，吐不了药即活。
　　立马回疔夺命散　治疔疮及喉痹乳蛾肿痛大效。　　牡蛎　当归　牛蒡子　僵蚕各半两　大黄一两　　右(口父)咀，每服半两，用青石磨刀水酒各一盏煎，去滓连进二服。疔疮服后出汗者生，无汗者死。[470p]

Five Saints Powder for Treating Sores.

Two taels of locust bean needles, one wild vine, one tael each of rhubarb, honeysuckle, fresh ginger, and licorice. Crush these, use two sheng of good wine to decoct until reduced by a third, remove the residue, and take warm as needed.

Death-Defying Soul-Reviving Powder for Treating All Sores with Chill and Fever, Dullness, Incoherence, Swelling of the Skin, and Loss of Appetite. Two and a half qian each of rhubarb, scaphium, and gardenia, ground into a fine powder; two qian each of croton seeds and apricot kernels, stir-fried with bran to black, and ground into a fine powder; five qian of human flesh powder, with five cloves of garlic, remove the cores and fill the human powder, roast until dry, then grind into a powder; one qian each of morning glory root powder and bitter clove. Mix these fine powders well. Take half a qian for mild cases and one qian for severe cases, adjusted with fresh drawn well water. One dose shows results; if the patient is severe with no pulse, taking the medicine results in vomiting after about a meal, and the physician cannot help; if the medicine cannot be vomited, recovery is possible.

Immediate Return Powder for Sores and Effective Treatment of Throat Swelling and Pain. Half a tael each of oyster, angelica, burdock seeds, and silkworms, and one tael of rhubarb. Crush and take half a tael each time, use one cup of spring water and wine, decoct, remove the residue, and take two doses. If sweating occurs after taking the powder for sores, there is life; if no sweating, there is death.[470p]

　　御史散　治疔疮。
　　生铁锈三钱
　　为末，木香磨酒调下，分病上下，食前食后服之，得微汗而愈。此方乃秘法也，未尝试用。常治疔疮有赤丝攻心腹者，用铁锈三钱、牡蛎二钱、青盐一钱为末，挑破疮头，以灯盏内油调搽，其丝自回，名唤回丹，但未用服。考之《本草》云：铁锈，生铁上衣也，治恶疮疥癣蜘蛛等咬，蒜磨敷之，亦未云服。家藏方用猫儿眼草一担细切，以水担余浸二日，煮百余沸，去渣取汁，煎至三四碗，用生铁锈细研末三两，徐徐入汁内，以铁杖不住手搅，再煎至二碗许，成膏子，治一切痈疽疮毒，甚效。瘰疬溃后，涂疮孔内尤妙。
　　加减通圣散　治疔疮、瘴气、紫游风等证。　　防风　荆芥　连翘　赤芍药　当归　川芎　桔梗　黄芩　栀子　青木香　甘草　元参　牛蒡子　大黄　芒硝　紫金皮　鸡屎子　诈死子　谷藤根　芙蓉根　嫩桕根　青王叉　　右，薄荷、生地黄煎服。[471p]

Yushi San - Treating Scrofula

Use three qian of rust from raw iron, ground into a powder. Mix with wine made from wood fragrance, divide into two doses, and take before and after meals. When mild sweating occurs, it is effective. This formulation is a secret method and has not been tried for use.

For treating scrofula with red threads attacking the heart and abdomen, use three qian of iron rust, two qian of oyster, and one qian of blue salt ground into powder. Break open the sore's top and apply oil mixed in a lamp, allowing the threads to retract; this is known as "Returning Dan," but it has not been used for consumption. According to "Ben Cao," iron rust comes from the surface of raw iron and is used to treat ulcers, scabs, and bites from spiders. It is said that applying garlic ground into a paste is effective, but there is no mention of it being taken orally.

In the household remedy, use one cart of cat’s eye grass finely chopped, soak in water for two days, boil it for over a hundred times, remove the residue and extract the juice. Brew down to three or four bowls, then add three liang of finely ground raw iron rust, stirring constantly with an iron rod until it becomes a paste. Further reduce to about two bowls; this can treat all types of abscesses and poisonous sores effectively. It is especially wonderful for treating the cavity after the swelling bursts.

Jiajian Tongsheng San - Treating Scrofula, Miasma, Ziyoufeng, and similar symptoms

Ingredients: Fangfeng, Jingjiao, Lianqiao, Chishaoyao, Danggui, Chuanxiong, Jiegeng, Huangqin, Zhizi, Qingmuxiang, Gancao, Yuanshen, Niubangzi, Dahuang, Mangxiao, Zijinpi, Jishizi, Zhadizi, Gutenggen, Furonggen, Nenjiao, Qingwangcha.

Take with a decoction of mint and raw rehmannia.[471p]

　　追疔夺命汤　秘方速效，能内消肿。　　羌活　独活　青皮多用　防风多用　黄连　赤芍药　细辛　甘草节　蝉蜕　白僵蚕　鸡爪川黄连各等分　再加紫河车　泽兰　金银花　　右(口父)咀，每服五钱。先将一服加泽兰少用叶、金银花各一两，生姜十片，同药擂烂，好酒旋之，热服，不吃酒者水煎为妙；后用酒水各一盏半，生姜十片，煎盏半，热服，汗出为度；病退减后，再加大黄二钱，煎如前，热服，再利一二次去余毒为妙。此方以药味观之，甚若不切，然效速神验，万无一失，累用累效。如有别证再出，宜随证加减治之，速效。若心烦呕吐，加甘草节一钱，豆粉酸浆水下。呕逆恶心，加乳香，豆粉甘草汤下。有脓加何首乌、白芷。要利，加青木香、大黄、牵牛、栀子。在脚，加木瓜。以上各等分。[472p]

Swift-acting Decoction for Abscesses: This secret formula can internally reduce swelling.

Ingredients:

  • Qianghuo (Notopterygium)
  • Duhuo (Angelica Pubescens)
  • Qingpi (Green Skin of Citrus)
  • Fangfeng (Siler)
  • Huanglian (Coptis)
  • Chishao (Red Peony Root)
  • Xixin (Asarum)
  • Gancao (Licorice)
  • Chan tui (Silkworm Shell)
  • Baijiangcan (Bee Chrysalis)
  • Jizhu (Chuan Huanglian)
  • Equal parts of each

Additional ingredients:

  • Zihua Che (Cordyceps)
  • Zexie (Alisma)
  • Jinyinhua (Honeysuckle)

Preparation: Chew this mixture thoroughly; take five qian (a traditional Chinese measurement). First, add a little Zexie leaves and Jinyinhua, each one liang (another measurement), and ten slices of fresh ginger to this mixture. Grind it with good wine, then take it hot; for those who don't consume alcohol, boil with water for best effect.

Next, use one and a half cups each of wine and water, along with ten slices of ginger, and boil until reduced to one cup and a half, then take hot until sweating occurs. After the illness subsides, add two qian of Dahuang (Rhubarb) and prepare as before, taking hot again. Repeat this until any residual toxins are expelled. This formula, although seeming overly simplistic, is incredibly quick and effective, guaranteeing success with repeated use.

If there are additional symptoms, adjust treatment accordingly for rapid effect. For restlessness and vomiting, add one qian of Gancao and take with a sour bean powder mixed with water. For nausea and reverse flow, add frankincense and take with bean powder licorice soup. If there is pus, add He Shou Wu (Fo-Ti) and Baizhi (Angelica Dahurica). To promote bowel movements, add Qingmuxiang (Agarwood), Dahuang, Qianqiu (Morning Glory), and Zhizi (Gardenia). If treatment is needed for the legs, add papaya. Use equal parts of all ingredients.[472p]

　　加减追疔夺命汤　治疔疮及痈疽发背恶疮，焮赤肿痛创人；或紫游风、赤游风，并大效。　　防风　赤芍药　连翘　羌活　独活　细辛　青皮　白僵蚕　蝉蜕　青木香　甘草节　金银花　紫河车　脚莲　　右，生姜、泽兰、生地黄煎服。病势退减，加大黄取利，下三五行，去大黄。[473p]

Jia Jian Chui Ding Duo Ming Decoction treats sores and abscesses, as well as severe infections that cause red, swollen, and painful wounds. It is also effective for purple wind and red wind. The ingredients include:

  • Fang Feng (Siler)
  • Chi Shao Yao (Red Peony)
  • Lian Qiao (Forsythia)
  • Qiang Huo (Notopterygium)
  • Du Huo (Angelica)
  • Xi Xin (Asarum)
  • Qing Pi (Green Peel)
  • Bai Jiang Can (Silkworm)
  • Chan Tui (Cicada Molt)
  • Qing Mu Xiang (Green Wood Fragrance)
  • Gan Cao Jie (Licorice)
  • Jin Yin Hua (Honeysuckle)
  • Zi He Che (Purple River Vehicle)
  • Jiao Lian (Foot Lotus)

This is prepared with fresh ginger, Ze Lan (Lycopus), and Sheng Di Huang (Rehmannia) for decoction. As the illness retreats, increase the dosage of Da Huang (Rhubarb) to promote bowel movement, then reduce it after three to five doses.[473p]

　　防风当归汤　治疔疮发热，大便实者。　　金银花　山慈姑　青木香　当归　赤芍药　白芷　防风　荆芥　连翘　升麻　羌活　独活　甘草　大黄　　右，薄荷、生地黄煎服。

　　雄麝汤　解疔毒如神。凡解毒，不可无雄黄、朱砂。　　雄黄　朱砂　麝香　乳香并另研，各一钱　白芷　茜根　真菉豆粉　地丁各二钱　牡蛎　白僵蚕　牛蒡子炒　(石卜)硝　大黄　山栀子　金银花　青木香　荆芥穗　甘草各一钱　核桃二个，去膜壳　　右，以白芷以后十四味细切，用无灰酒一碗浸少时，擂细，又加水一碗，同煎至一碗，去渣及浊脚，入前雄黄等五味调匀，作一服。更审患处经络分野，依东垣引经泻火药加之尤妙。欲利倍加大黄、(石卜)硝，二味临后下。茜草即过山龙。地丁即大蓟也，一云剪刀草，开黄花者名黄花地丁，开紫花者名紫花地丁。[474p]

Fangfeng Danggui Decoction: Treats sores and fevers, especially in patients with constipation.
Ingredients: Honeysuckle, mountain taro, green wood fragrance, Angelica sinensis, red peony, white atractylodes, sileris, schizonepeta, forsythia, cimicifuga, qwansong, licorice, rhubarb.
Additionally, mint and raw rehmannia should be decocted for consumption.

Xiong she Decoction: Detoxifies sores effectively. For detoxification, it is essential to include realgar and cinnabar.
Ingredients: Realgar, cinnabar, musk, frankincense (each one qian); white atractylodes, madder root, real garcinia gummi-guttatum powder, dandelion (each two qian); oyster, white silkworm, roasted burdock seed, (stone) nitre, rhubarb, mountain gardenia, honeysuckle, green wood fragrance, schizonepeta spike, licorice (each one qian); two walnuts, shelled.
Preparation: First, finely chop the medicinal herbs (white atractylodes and the other fourteen ingredients), soak them in one bowl of ash-free wine for a while, grind finely, then add one bowl of water and decoct until reduced to one bowl. Strain and remove residues, then mix with the prior five ingredients (realgar, etc.). Make into one dose. Pay attention to the affected area's meridians and pathways, and according to Dongyuan’s guidance on draining fire, add appropriate herbs for best results. To enhance efficacy, increase rhubarb and (stone) nitre, adding them last. The madder root is also known as mountain dragon. Dandelion refers to great thistle; it is also known as scissor herb, where the yellow flower variety is called yellow flower dandelion and the purple flower variety is called purple flower dandelion.[474p]

　　解毒消瘴散　治疔疮瘴气发热者。
　　柴胡　黄芩　黄蘗　栀　木通　赤芍药　当归　防风　连翘　大黄　甘草　青木香　紫金皮　鸡屎子　　诈死子　青王叉　嫩桕根　苦花子
　　右，薄荷、生地黄煎服。

　　劫瘴消毒散　治瘴气肿痛发热者，及因剥割瘴死牛马猪羊而中其毒者，或因食瘴死之肉而中其毒者。先服加减通圣散，通利大便，次服此药。　　百丈光即天瓠，又名土人参　苦花子　大小青　金脑香即社茶根，梗叶俱可用　臭木待根　紫金藤　生蓝叶　水圹根　乌苞根　嫩桕根　青王叉　山乌豆　鸡屎子　晚祥西　狸咬柴　土木香　　右，薄荷煎服。肿势甚，加水金凤、水苦荠。手足拘挛，加钩藤根、梭婆子根。发热，加吉面消、毛蕨根。小便不通，加木通、栀子。[475p]

Detoxifying and dispelling miasma powder, used for treating sores and heat caused by miasma.

Ingredients: Chai Hu, Huang Qin, Huang Bo, Zhi Zi, Mu Tong, Chi Shao Yao, Dang Gui, Fang Feng, Lian Qiao, Da Huang, Gan Cao, Qing Mu Xiang, Zi Jin Pi, Ji Shi Zi, Zha Si Zi, Qing Wang Cha, tender jujube root, Ku Hua Zi.

For use, boil with mint and raw Di Huang.

Miasma dispelling and detoxifying powder, for treating swelling, pain, and fever caused by miasma, or for those poisoned by the corpses of animals that died from miasma, or from consuming meat of such animals. First take a modified Tong Sheng powder to promote bowel movement, then this remedy.

Ingredients include: Bai Zhang Guang, also known as Tian Hu, or Tu Ren Shen; Ku Hua Zi; large and small Qing; Jin Nao Xiang, or She Cha root, both stems and leaves can be used; Chou Mu Dai root; Zi Jin Teng; fresh Luan leaves; Shui Huang root; Wu Bao root; tender jujube root; Qing Wang Cha; Shan Wu Dou; Ji Shi Zi; Wan Xiang Xi; Li Yao Chai; Tu Mu Xiang.

For use, boil with mint. If swelling is severe, add water from Jin Feng or Ku Ji. For cramps in hands and feet, add Gou Teng root or Suo Po Zi root. If there is fever, add Ji Mian Xiao or Mao Juan root. If urination is obstructed, add Mu Tong or Zhi Zi.[475p]

　　青黄消毒散　治疔疮瘴气，服凉药过剂，沉而不发不退者。　　雄黄研　大小青各一两　八角茴香五钱　　右末，陈酒调服；又以酢和米泔涂患处，一日服三次。
　　四神丹　治因剥割瘴死牛马猪羊，不避其气，以中其毒，或因食瘴死牛马猪羊之肉者，或手足各处发疔毒，或起紫泡，或起堆核，初则创人，次渐肿大，疼痛不可忍，瞀闷发热，口渴心烦，四肢强痛，头目昏花，一切瘴毒，并皆治之。先服此药，次服劫瘴消毒散。　　苦花子又名毛连子，又名小叶金鸡舌，梗叶俱用　土木香根名青木香，梗名天仙藤，花名马兜铃　仙人薯用根，新鲜生者为妙，干者次之，各二两晚蚕砂一两　　右铡碎擂，水和煮浓汁，冷服。热极加芭蕉心。小便不利加琉璃草，又名耳环尻，擂和前药服之。[476p]

Qinghuang Xiaodusan treats carbuncles and pestilential qi, suitable for those who take cooling medicine but remain stagnant and unresponsive.

Ingredients:

  • Realgar, ground
  • One tael each of large and small blue (must be a specific herb)
  • Five qian of star anise

Grind them together, mix with aged wine for ingestion; additionally, mix vinegar with rice wash to apply to the affected area, taken three times a day.

Sishen Dan treats cases where cattle, horses, pigs, or sheep die from pestilential qi due to improper handling of their remains. It detoxifies those who consume such meat or develop boils and blisters on arms and legs. Initially, it causes wounds, followed by swelling and intense pain, leading to confusion, fever, thirst, irritability, and strong pain in limbs, along with dizziness. It treats all forms of pestilential toxicity. First, take this medicine, followed by the Qinghuang Xiaodusan.

Bitter flower seed, also known as Mao Lianzi or Little Leaf Golden Rooster Tongue, uses both the stems and leaves.

The root of Mucuna pruriens is called Qingmuxiang; its vine is Tianxian Teng, while the flower is known as Ma Dou Ling.

The root of Xianren Shupin is best when fresh; dried is second-best, with two taels of each and one tael of silkworm sand to be blended finely.

Boil with water to create a concentrated juice and take it cold. If heat is extreme, add banana heart. If urination is difficult, add Liulicao, also known as Earring Kaka, pounding and mixing it with the preceding medicine for ingestion.[476p]

　　万全散　治瘴气时毒、疔疮、蛇犬咬等证。　　嫩桕根　水圹根　狸咬柴　乌苞根　青王叉　生蓝叶　溪枫根　穿山蜈蚣　　右，薄荷煎服，及调雄黄末服，或合七神散更妙。
　　七圣紫金锭　治疔疮、瘴气、时毒等证。　　土木香　苦花子连梗叶　仙人薯　晚蚕砂　桕花各一两　朱砂　雄黄各三钱　　右末，秫米糊为丸，以毛屎梯根磨水化下。
　　朱墨丸　治疔疮瘴毒。
　　朱砂　京墨各等分
　　右末，以蟾酥汁为丸如梧桐子大，每服二丸，以葱白煎汤吞下，日服一二次。[477p]

Wanquan Powder treats symptoms such as epidemic miasma, festering sores, and bites from snakes and dogs. The ingredients are: tender jujube root, water cypress root, badger bite herb, black bulrush root, green king fork, fresh indigo leaf, stream maple root, and mountain centipede. These are to be taken with mint decoction or mixed with realgar powder; combining with Qishen Powder is even better.

Qisheng Zijin Ding treats festering sores, miasma, and epidemic toxins. The ingredients include: earth wood incense, bitter flower seeds with stems and leaves, fairy potato, late silkworm sand, and jujube flowers—all one tael each; and three qian each of cinnabar and realgar. Grind these into a powder, then make pills with glutinous rice paste, dissolving with water made from toad venom.

Zhumo Pill treats festering sores and miasma toxins. The ingredients are equal parts of cinnabar and Beijing ink. Grind them into powder and make pills the size of phoenix seeds using toad venom juice. Take two pills each time, swallowing them with green onion decoction, once or twice daily.[477p]

　　万病解毒丸　治疔疮、痈疽、发背、肿疡、时毒、狐狸毒、鼠莽毒。丹毒、惊毒、瘴毒、风毒、热毒、蛊毒、河豚毒、疫死牛马猪羊毒、蛇犬蜈蚣蜂蝎百虫螫咬毒、汤火所伤、中恶邪气、无名肿毒、菇毒、砒毒、药毒、疮毒、光粉轻粉毒，一切邪热毒悉皆治之。　　麝香二钱　朱砂五钱　山豆根　续随子取仁　雄黄　紫河车　独脚莲各一两　五倍子三两　红牙大戟一两五钱　山慈姑二两　　右末，秫米糊和匀，杵捣一千余下，印作锭子，随意大小，每服一锭，井水磨化，冬月用薄荷汤磨服，日可进二三服。
　　刷瘴散　治疔疮、瘴毒，服药后，可用此药刷涂。　　生蓝叶　地薄荷　紫金藤
　　右，擂米泔水暖刷患处，次加蚕砂、凌霄花、鸡(月臣)花。二花如无，以叶代之。
　　掞瘴散　治疔疮、瘴毒溃烂成疮。
　　桕树皮去外面粗皮　侧柏叶各等分
　　右细末，以桕油先刷，次掞末。

　　洗瘴方[478p]

Wandering Poison-Removing Pill
Treats sores and abscesses, carbuncles, swellings, seasonal toxins, fox poison, rat poison, dan poison, shock poison, miasma poison, wind poison, heat poison, gu poison, pufferfish poison, cattle, horses, pigs, sheep dying from epidemics, the poison of snake, dog, centipede, bee, scorpion, and all insect stings. It also treats burns from fire, evil qi, nameless swellings, mushroom poison, arsenic poison, medicinal poison, sore poison, and all varieties of evil and hot toxins.

Ingredients:

  • Musk: 2 qian
  • Cinnabar: 5 qian
  • Mountain bean root: 1 liang
  • Sīzǐ (a type of seed): Remove the kernel
  • Realgar: 1 liang
  • Purple river car: 1 liang
  • Sole lotus: 1 liang
  • Wu bei zi: 3 liang
  • Red-toothed big thistle: 1.5 qian
  • Mountain narcissis: 2 liang

Grind the above into fine powder, mix with glutinous rice paste until smooth. Pound it over a thousand times and form into pills of any desired size. Take one pill each time, dissolve in well water; in winter, use mint tea to dissolve it, taking 2 to 3 doses per day.

Miasma Brush Powder
Treats sores and miasma poison. After taking the medication, this powder can be used for brushing and applying.
Ingredients:

  • Fresh indigo leaves
  • Ground mint
  • Purple gold vine

Grind with warm rice wash water to brush the affected area, then add silkworm sand and lingxiao flower. If the two flowers are unavailable, substitute with leaves.

Lifting Miasma Powder
Treats sores and miasma poison that have rotted into ulcers.
Ingredients:

  • Soft bark of the jujube tree, removing the rough outer layer
  • Arborvitae leaves, equal parts

Grind fine, first apply jujube oil, then the above powder.

Washing Miasma Formula[478p]

　　桕叶　朴叶　柳枝　连叉叶
　　右，煎水淋洗之。

　　罗氏托里敝　治一切发背疔疮。
　　黄芪两半　厚朴　川芎　防风　桔梗各二两　连翘二两二钱　芍药　官桂　白芷　甘草节　人参各一两　木香　没药　乳香　当归各半两　　右为细末，每服三钱，酒一大盏，煎二三沸，和渣温服。
　　连翘黄芪汤　治疔疮。因食瘴死牛羊，足生大疔，如钉入肉，痛不可忍者。　　金银花　黄芪　当归　蜈蚣一条，去头足酒炙　连翘　甘草　　右，生姜煎服。

　　罗氏保生锭子　治疔疮、背疽、瘰疬，一切恶疮。　　金脚信　轻粉各二钱　雄黄　硇砂各三钱　麝香一钱半　蟾酥一钱　巴豆生，四十九粒，另研　　右为细末，用黄蜡五钱镕开，将药和成锭子，冷水浸少时取出，旋丸，捏作饼子如钱眼大，将疮头拨开，每用一饼，次用神圣膏，后用托里散。若疮气入腹危者，服破棺丹。世传疔疮必有一条红线，可针红线所至之处，出毒血，然后敷药。[479p]

Jujube leaves, magnolia leaves, willow branches, and compound leaves,
To the right, steep in water and wash.

Luo's Toli ointment treats all back carbuncles.
Two taels of Astragalus, two taels of magnolia bark, two taels of Chuanxiong, two taels of Fangfeng, two taels of Platycodon, two taels and two qian of Forsythia, one tael of Peony, one tael of Cinnamon, one tael of Angelica, one tael of White Angelica, one tael of licorice root segments, and one tael of ginseng, half a tael each of Musk, Myrrh, Frankincense, and Angelica.
Grind all to a fine powder; each dose is three qian mixed with a large cup of wine, boil two or three times, and take the warm decoction with the dregs.
Forsythia and Astragalus Decoction treats carbuncles caused by consuming pestilential food that kills cattle and sheep, resulting in severe carbuncles like nails driven into flesh, causing unbearable pain.
Use honeysuckle, Astragalus, Angelica, one centipede (heads and legs removed and wine-roasted), Forsythia, and licorice, with fresh ginger to be boiled for consumption.

Luo's Baosheng Pills treat carbuncles, back abscesses, scrofula, and all types of malignant sores.
Two qian of Gold Foot Sign powder, three qian each of Realgar and Nao sand, one and a half qian of Musk, one qian of toad venom, and forty-nine fresh seeds of Ba Dou ground separately.
Grind to a fine powder, melt five qian of yellow wax, mix the medicine into pills; soak in cold water briefly, then roll into small cakes about the size of a coin hole. When treating sores, open the sore and place one cake, followed by using divine ointment, then the Toli powder. If the sore's toxicity has entered the abdomen and is dangerous, take Po Guandan. It is traditionally said that carbuncles must have a red line; you can needle where the red line extends to release toxic blood, then apply the medicine.[479p]

　　滴滴金　治疔疮。
　　硇砂　轻粉　人言　雄黄　朱砂各一钱　麝香少许　　右为细末，每用些少，先以针刺开疮头，贴药黄水出，效。
　　疔疮锭子
　　硇砂一钱　白芷　雄黄　苍耳子　甘草各半钱　　右为细末，用蟾酥汁和作锭子，如前法用。须五月五日合。
　　回疮锭子　治疔疮大效。
　　草乌头一两　蟾酥七粒　巴豆七个，去皮　麝香一字　　右为细末，面糊和就，捻如锭子。如有恶疮肿毒，不痛无血者，用针深刺至痛处，有血出，以此锭子纴之，上用膏药贴之，疔疮四畔纴之，其疗二三日自然拔出。此药最宜紧用。此证大抵与伤寒颇类，其中亦有可针镰砭射出血者，亦有久而溃烂出脓者，其间变异百端，不可不慎也！[480p]

Drip gold to treat furuncles. Naphthol, light powder, commonly said to be realgar and vermilion, each one qian, with a little musk, ground into a fine powder. For use, take a small amount, first prick the abscess with a needle to let out yellow fluid, apply the medicine, and it will be effective.

Furuncle pill: One qian of naphthol, half a qian each of white atractylodes, realgar, cocklebur seeds, and licorice, ground into a fine powder. Mix with toad venom to make into pills, using the previous method. Must be made on the fifth day of the fifth month.

Returning sore pill, effective in treating larger furuncles. One liang of wild aconite, seven grains of toad venom, seven skinned seeds of croton, one character of musk; grind all into a fine powder, mix with dough to form into pills. If there are evil sores with swelling and poison, painless and no blood, use a needle to deeply prick until there's pain and blood comes out, then apply this pill and use a plaster on top. Surround the furuncle with it, and in two to three days it will naturally expel. This medicine must be used tightly. This condition is generally similar to typhoid fever, but there may also be cases where superficial bleeding occurs, or cases that have festered and produced pus for a long time. There are various changes and combinations, so one must be cautious![480p]

　　神圣膏药罗氏　治一切恶疮。
　　木鳖五十个，去皮　当归　槁本各半两　没药　乳香各二钱　白芨　琥珀各二钱半　黄丹　黄蜡各二两　白胶香三两　巴豆十五粒，去油　粉霜　胆矾各一钱　槐柳枝各一百二十枝　清油　　右件一处先将槐柳枝下在油内熬焦取出，复下余药，熬勿至焦滤出，却将油澄清，下黄丹再熬成膏，用绯帛摊之，立有神效。
　　夺命散 【《保命集》】 　治疔疮。　　乌头尖　附子底　蝎梢　雌黄　雄黄各一钱　蜈蚣一两　硇砂　粉霜　轻粉各五分　脑子　麝香各少许　砒二钱半　　右为细末，先破疮出恶血，以草杖头用纸带药末插入于内，以深为度。[481p]

Holy Ointment
Treats all kinds of malignant sores.
Fifty bitter gourd seeds, peeled; each of Angelica and dry root, half a tael; myrrh and frankincense, two qian each; white ginger and amber, two and a half qian each; yellow orpiment and yellow wax, two taels each; white resin, three taels; fifteen castor beans, oil removed; powdered alum and white vitriol, one qian each; one hundred twenty branches of sophora and willow. Use clean oil. First, place the willow branches in the oil and fry until charred, then remove them and add the remaining medicines. Fry until not burnt, then filter and clarify the oil. Add yellow orpiment and continue frying to make an ointment, spread on a red cloth, which will have miraculous effects.

Deadly Powder (from "Preserving Life" Collection)
Treats abscesses.
Auspicious seeds as a tip, aconite roots, scorpion tails; arsenic and realgar, each one qian; centipede, one tael; narcissus, powdered alum, and light powder, each five fen; a bit of brain tissue and musk; two and a half qian of arsenic.
Grind finely, first break the sore to release the foul blood; using a paper-wrapped herbal stick, insert the powdered medicine deep into the wound.[481p]

　　郭氏寸金锭子　治疔毒恶疮。
　　朱砂三钱　黄丹　明矾枯　砒霜　轻粉　花碱　白芨各钱半　蟾酥　脑子　麝香各少许　　右研极细末，稠糊和为锭子，用之。
　　郭氏提疔锭子　治疔疮危笃发昏，兼治瘰疬。　　雄黄　朱砂各二钱　青盐　砒霜生　白丁香　螌蝥去翅足　真轻粉各一钱五分　蟾酥　麝香各一钱　黄蜡　蓖麻子三七粒　　右为细末，于银器内或磁器，先将蜡镕化，和前药，丸如桐子大，捻作饼子，用针刺破疔疮，放一饼子于疮头上，又刺四边五七下，恶血出为妙，却用软膏药贴之，立验。内服首功元黑散或蟾酥丸。
　　郭氏守效散　点疔疮恶肉。
　　砒霜生　白丁香　松香　真轻粉　川乌　生矾各二钱　蜈蚣一条，焙干　　右为极细末，铍针刺破疮口，令血出，唾津调药贴之疮上，其根自溃。[482p]

Guo's small gold ingot treats malignant sores and boils.

Three qian of cinnabar, yellow dan, alum, arsenic, light powder, flower alkali, and white atractylodes each at one and a half qian; a small amount of toad venom, brains, and musk. Grind finely into a powder, mix with a thick paste to form tablets for use.

Guo's boil tablets treat severe boils and also cure scrofula.

Two qian each of orpiment and cinnabar, one and a half qian each of blue salt, crude arsenic, white clove, cricket without wings or legs, and true light powder; one qian each of toad venom and musk; three to seven seeds of castor bean.

Grind to a fine powder, then melt the wax in silver or ceramic, mix with the previous powders, form pills the size of a Chinese parasol seed, flatten them into cakes. Use a needle to puncture the boil and place one cake on the sore, then make four or five additional punctures around it to release bad blood; apply a soft ointment to seal it, yielding immediate results. Internally take Shougongyuan black powder or toad venom pills.

Guo's effective powder targets malignant flesh of boils.

Two qian each of crude arsenic, white clove, pine resin, and true light powder; two qian of black aconite and raw alum; and one dried centipede. Grind finely, then use a steel needle to puncture the sore, allowing blood to flow. Mix the medicine with saliva and apply to the sore; the root will dissolve by itself.[482p]

　　麝香蟾酥丸　治一切痈疽、发背、疔疮内毒，如未破，用针刺破，捻药在内，膏药贴之，其疮即溃。　　蟾酥　轻粉　乳香各五分　信　雄黄各一钱　巴豆十个，去皮油　麝香少许　寒水石三钱　　右为细末，滴水为丸，作锭子如小麦粒大，量疮大小用之。寒食面糊为丸。
　　追毒丹　取黄，去疔头，追脓毒，立效。　　蟾酥干者用酒化　硇砂　白丁香无此味加巴豆　真轻粉各一钱　雄黄　朱砂为衣，各二钱　蜈蚣酒浸炙干黄　巴豆七粒，去壳不去油　　右总为细末，面调水为丸，如丸不就，用酒打面糊为丸，如麦大，两头尖，入于针破口内，用水沉膏贴之，后用膏药及生肌药追出脓血毒物。又如有黑陷漏疮者，四围死败肉不去，不生肌者，不可治也，亦用此药追毒，去死肌败肉，生新肉而愈。小者用一粒，大者加用之，病轻者不必用针，只以手指甲爬动于疮顶上，安此药，水沉膏贴之，其疮即时红肿为度，去其败肉为妙。[483p]

Musk Toad Mucilage Pill: This cures all abscesses, carbuncles, and internal poison from sores. If the sore has not yet ruptured, puncture with a needle, insert the medicine, and apply a plaster; the sore will then break down.

Ingredients:

  • Toad mucilage: 5 grams
  • Light powder: 5 grams
  • Frankincense: 5 grams
  • Authentic (Xinyi): 1 gram
  • Realgar: 1 gram
  • Croton seed: 10 pieces, with skin removed
  • A little musk
  • Cold water stone: 3 grams

Grind these into a fine powder, add water to form pills the size of wheat grains, and use according to the size of the sore. Use cold rice paste to form the pills.

Chasing Poison Pill: Take the yellow (from the sore) and remove the head of the sore to pursue the pus and poison. Immediate effect.

Ingredients:

  • Dried toad mucilage: dissolve in wine
  • Realgar
  • White clove (without this flavor, add croton seed)
  • Authentic light powder: 1 gram each
  • Yellow lead and cinnabar for coating: 2 grams each
  • Centipede soaked in wine, roasted until dry: yellow
  • Croton seeds: 7 pieces, with shell removed but oil not removed

Grind these into a fine powder. Mix with water to form pills; if pills do not hold, use wine to mix. Form pills the size of wheat grains, pointed at both ends, and insert into the punctured sore. Apply a paste made from water; use a plaster to sink the essences, and afterward apply plaster medication to expel pus, blood, and poisonous materials.

For black and necrotic sores surrounded by dead or rotten flesh that cannot be regenerated, do not attempt treatment; instead, use this medication to chase the poison, remove the dead and rotten tissue, and promote the growth of new flesh to heal. For small abscesses, use one pill; for larger ones, increase the dosage. For mild cases, needles are unnecessary; simply use your fingernail to gently scrape the top of the sore, apply this medication, and cover it with water paste; the sore will immediately become red and swollen, making it easier to remove the rotten tissue.[483p]

　　海马拔毒散　治疔疮大效，兼治恶疮发背。　　海马二个，炙　穿山甲黄土炒，去土　朱砂　水银各一钱　麝香　片脑各少许　雄黄三分　　右为末，针破疮口，点药入内，一日一点，大有效。
　　芫花根膏　治鱼脐疔疮久治不瘥者。　　芫花根一两　黑豆三合　猪牙皂角五挺　白矾三两，煅研细　　右用酢一斗，将前三味先浸三日于釜中，以火煎至二升，去渣，却入铛中，煎至一升，入白矾末搅令匀，去火成膏。但是鱼脐丹恶疮摊于帛上贴，日二易之。[484p]

Hai Ma Ba Du San is highly effective for treating abscesses and also treats ulcerations on the back. Ingredients: two sea horses, roasted; pangolin scales stir-fried to remove soil; one qian each of cinnabar and mercury; a little musk and wolfberry; three fen of realgar. Grind these into a fine powder. Use a needle to puncture the ulcer and apply the powder inside, one point per day, significantly effective.

Yuan Hua Gen Gao treats fish navel abscesses that have not healed after prolonged treatment. Ingredients: one liang of yuan hua root, three he of black beans, five pieces of pig's tooth soap pod, three liang of white alum, calcined and finely ground. Use one dou of vinegar to soak the first three ingredients for three days in a pot, then simmer until reduced to two sheng, discard the residue, then simmer again until reduced to one sheng, add the ground white alum and mix evenly, then remove from heat to form a paste. Apply this paste to the fish navel ulcer and replace it twice daily.[484p]

　　四圣旋疔散　治疔疮生于四肢，其势微者，先以好酢调药涂上，以纸封之，次内服托里之药，其疔自旋出根。　　巴豆仁五分　白僵蚕　轻粉　硇砂各二钱半　　右为细末，酢调用之。

　　拔毒散　治疔疮。
　　盐白霜　粉霜　胆矾　硇砂各一钱，另研　蜈蚣一条，炙　　右为末和匀，先用羊骨针挑破头，点药在上，酢糊纸贴上，其根一时自出。
　　保生饼子　治诸疔等疮。
　　金脚信二钱　雄黄　硇砂各三钱　轻粉　麝香各一钱　巴豆四十九粒，泡熟去壳研　　右为末和匀，用黄蜡一两镕和药成锭，水浸少时取出，用时捻作饼如钱眼大，以羊角骨针挑疮头，按药在上，以酢糊纸贴之，膏药亦可，黄水出为效。[485p]

Four Sacred Remedies for Boils

To treat boils arising on the limbs, if they are mild, first apply a mixture of good vinegar with the medicine, covering it with paper. Then take oral medications to dispel the toxin, allowing the boil to gradually draw out its roots.

Ingredients:

  • Five fen of croton seed
  • Two and a half qian each of white silkworm, light powder, and realgar, and two and a half qian of calomel.
    Grind these into a fine powder and mix with vinegar for use.

Detoxifying Powder

To treat boils.
Ingredients:

  • One qian each of salt white frost, powdered frost, blue vitriol, and calomel.
  • One centipede, roasted.
    Grind everything together into a powder. First, use a sheep bone needle to pierce the head of the boil, apply the medicine on top, then cover with paper paste. The root will come out in time.

Preserving Life Cake

To treat various boils and sores.
Ingredients:

  • Two qian of gold-footed herb
  • Three qian each of realgar and calomel
  • One qian each of light powder and musk
  • Forty-nine pieces of croton seed, soaked, cooked, and shelled, then ground.
    Mix these into a powder and combine with one liang of yellow wax to form a cake. Soak in water for a while then remove. When needed, pinch off a piece the size of a coin, use a sheep horn needle to pierce the head of the sore, apply the medicine on top, and cover with paper paste. Ointment can also be applied, as yellow fluid will emerge as a result.[485p]

　　济生金砂散　取疔疮。
　　道人头微炒存性，一两。即苍耳子　硇砂三钱半　雄黄三钱　蟾酥以多为妙　　右，将疮四围刺破，油调药末于疮内，绯帛封之，数日疔自出。如疮入腹呕逆者，苍耳捣汁饮之。
　　铁罐膏　治一切恶疮内毒，此药止痛，追死肉。　　桑柴灰　荞麦秸灰　石灰各一碗　炭灰少许　　右用瓦罐一个，底旁钻一穴，塞住，将前项灰填在内，用水注满，厚纸封固，一伏时，用芦筒插在罐孔内淋之，尽其水，不用灰，将淋灰水于锅内慢火熬，用铁片续续搅，以滴水不散为度，铁罐盛之，封口，或有诸般疮及肠风痔漏，量疮用之妙。　　又方　用针刀点破疔头，以蟾酥敷之，后用。　　野菊花　莎草根　甜菜叶　擂细，以无灰酒尽量调服之，酒醒，疔化为水，即痛定。如热除，不必去疔，亦自愈也。[486p]

Ji Sheng Jin Sha San for treating carbuncles.

The Daoist practitioner lightly fries the main ingredient, 1 tael. Additionally, use 3.5 qian of Cang Erzi, 3 qian of Xionghuang, and a generous amount of Chan Su. First, prick the area around the sore and mix the powdered medicine with oil to apply inside the wound. Seal it with scarlet silk; within a few days, the carbuncle will naturally exit. If the sore has penetrated into the abdomen causing nausea and vomiting, drink juice from Cang Erzi.

Tie Guan Gao treats all internal toxins of severe sores. This medicine alleviates pain and expels dead tissue. Combine one bowl each of mulberry wood ash, buckwheat stalk ash, and lime, along with a small amount of charcoal ash. Use a clay pot, drill a hole at the bottom side, and seal it. Fill the pot with the aforementioned ashes, add water to fill it, and securely cover with thick paper. For a while, insert a bamboo tube into the pot hole, allowing the water to drain without using the ash. Slowly boil the drained ash water in a pot over low heat, stirring continuously with an iron spatula until it reaches a consistency that doesn’t scatter when dripped. Store it in a sealed iron pot. This can be applied to various sores and intestinal wind hemorrhoids as needed.

Another prescription involves pricking the head of the carbuncle with a needle and knife, applying Chan Su afterward.

Wild chrysanthemum, bulrush root, and beet leaves should be ground finely and mixed with plenty of ash-free wine for taking. Once sober, the carbuncle will dissolve into water, and the pain will subside. If the heat is eliminated, there's no need to remove the carbuncle; it will heal on its own.[486p]

　　铁粉散　专治冷疔疮经久不效。
　　多年生铁三钱，炒过　松脂一钱　黄丹飞过　轻粉各五分　麝香少许　　右为细末，用清油调搽疮口，立效。　　又方　治疔疮。
　　山慈姑　铁锈　生姜　江茶　盐少许　用银针拨开疔疮，即以前药搭作饼子如大棋子，放疔头上，甚者半月，皮皱可医，不皱难治矣。
　　雄黄散　治疔疮。
　　雄黄　硇砂　苍耳草烧灰
　　右为末，酢调数次，将菊花捣烂，姜汁调，清者服之，浓者敷之。[487p]

Iron Powder Powder: Specifically treats cold sores that have been ineffective for a long time.

Ingredients: Three qian (a unit of weight) of perennial iron, one qian of roasted pine resin, five fen (a smaller weight) each of yellow lead powder and light powder, and a small amount of musk.

Preparation: Grind the above into a fine powder, and mix with clear oil to apply to the sore, providing immediate effect.

Another Recipe for Treating Sores:

Ingredients: Mountain taro, rust, ginger, river tea, and a pinch of salt.

Preparation: Use a silver needle to pierce the sore, then take the preceding mixture and shape it into a cake the size of a chess piece, placing it on the sore. If severe, it may take half a month to heal; if the skin wrinkles, it can be treated, but if it does not wrinkle, it's difficult to cure.

Realgar Powder: For treating sores.

Ingredients: Realgar, arsenic, and burnt powder of cocklebur.

Preparation: Grind into a powder, and mix with vinegar several times. Crush chrysanthemum flowers, and mix with ginger juice; the clear mixture is for drinking, while the thicker one is for application.[487p]

　　追毒丸　治疔疮发背。
　　虾蟆粪二分　麻虫　雄黄　黄丹各一分　　右为末，水丸如米大，将疮拨开头，入药在内，以膏药贴之。
　　蜣蜋膏　治疔毒。
　　蜣螂三个，肚白者佳　黄麻虫十个
　　右二味捣匀，拨破患处贴之。如患在手足间，有红丝上臂，丝尽处将针挑断出血，仍用前药。　　又方　治疔疮毒气入腹，昏闷不食。　　紫花地丁　蝉蜕　贯仲各一两　乳香炙　丁香各二钱　　右为细末，每服二钱，空心温酒下。　　又方　治疔疮危笃者，二服即愈，轻者一服立效。　　土蜂房一小窠，全　蛇蜕一条，全
　　右作一处，器皿中盛，用黄泥封固，火煅存性，研为细末，每服一钱，空心好酒调服，少顷腹中大痛，痛止，其疮已化黄水矣。仍服五圣散。
　　五圣散
　　大黄　甘草各一两　生姜　皂角针　金银花各二两　(艹舌)蒌一个　　右(口父)咀，用好酒二升同煎至八分，去渣，不拘时服。[488p]

Zhui Du Wan for treating furuncles and skin boils.
Two fen of toad feces, one fen each of mazhong, realgar, and yellow earth. Grind these into a fine powder, form into pills the size of rice, then open the sore, place the medicine inside, and cover with a plaster.

Qianglang Gao for treating boil toxins.
Three dung beetles, with the white belly preferred, and ten yellow mazhong. Grind these two together and apply to the affected area. If it's on the hands or feet, and there are red threads on the arms, prick the end of the threads with a needle to draw blood, then use the previous medicine.

Another formula for treating the toxic energy from furuncles entering the abdomen, causing faintness and loss of appetite:
One liang each of purple flower ground ivy, cicada slough, and guanzhong; two qian each of processed frankincense and clove. Grind into a fine powder and take two qian each time with warm wine on an empty stomach.

Another formula for severe furuncles:
Taking it twice will heal; for mild cases, one dose will show immediate effect.
A small piece of earth bee nest intact, and a whole snake slough. Combine these, place in a vessel, seal with yellow clay, bake until well cooked, then grind into a fine powder. Take one qian each time with good wine on an empty stomach. Soon there will be great pain in the abdomen, and once the pain subsides, the sore will have turned into yellow fluid. Continue to take the Five Holy Powder.

Five Holy Powder:
One liang each of rhubarb and licorice; two liang each of fresh ginger, soapberry, honeysuckle; one caotong (likely a herbal ingredient). Grind these coarsely, bring to a boil with two sheng of good wine until reduced to eight parts, strain, and take at any time.[488p]

　　破棺丹　治疔黄走荫不止。
　　当归　赤芍药　山栀子　牵牛各二两半　连翘　牡蛎　金银花　紫花地丁各一两半　京三棱　甘草各二两　便秘加大黄三两。　　右为细末，炼蜜和丸如弹子大，每服一丸，食前用童便化开服。忌饮酒及生冷硬物。
　　立马回疔丹　治疔疮走荫不止。
　　金脚信　蟾酥　血竭　朱砂　没药各半钱　轻粉　龙脑　麝香各一字　　右为细末，用生草乌汁和如麦子大，用时将疮顶刺破，将药一锭放疮口内，第二日疮肿是效。　　又方　治疔走了黄，打滚将死者。
　　牡蛎　大黄　山栀子　金银花　木通　连翘　牛蒡子　地骨皮　乳香　没药　(艹舌)蒌　皂角刺　　右各等分，銼碎，每服半两，气壮者加(石卜)硝，用水一碗，酒半碗，煎一服，定愈。
　　蟾酥走黄丸　治疔疮走黄。
　　朱砂研　黄丹飞　白面各等分[489p]

Breaking the Coffin Pill
Treats sores that continuously drain yellow pus.
Ingredients:

  • 1.5 taels of each: Angelica, Red Peony, Mountain Gardenia, and Morning Glory.
  • 1.5 taels each of: Forsythia, Oyster, Honeysuckle, and Purple Flower Earth Letter.
  • 2 taels each of: Jing Sanling (a medicinal herb) and Licorice.
  • For constipation, add 3 taels of Rhubarb.

Prepare into a fine powder, and mix with honey to form pills the size of a bullet. Take one pill before meals, dissolved in boy's urine. Avoid alcohol and raw, cold, or hard foods.

Immediate Return for Sores Pill
Treats sores that continuously discharge pus.
Ingredients:

  • ½ qian each of: Golden-foot Trust, Toad Fat, Dragon’s Blood, Cinnabar, and Myrrh.
  • 1 character (qian) each of: Light Powder, Dragon Brain, and Musk.

Prepare into a fine powder, mix with fresh Aconite juice to form pills the size of wheat, and apply by piercing the sore and placing a pill inside. The swelling indicates effectiveness the next day.

Another formula for treating sores emitting yellow pus, especially in those on the verge of death.
Ingredients:

  • Equal parts of: Oyster, Rhubarb, Mountain Gardenia, Honeysuckle, Mutong, Forsythia, Burdock Seed, Earth Skin, Frankincense, Myrrh, (Grass Tongue) Gourd, and Soap Pod Thorn.

Crush and mix, take 0.5 tael per dose. For strong individuals, add (Stone Fortune) Nitrate, using one bowl of water and half a bowl of wine, simmer until effective treatment.

Toad Fat Yellow Pill
Treats sores that emit yellow pus.
Ingredients:

  • Equal parts of: Ground Cinnabar, Yellow Lead, and White Flour.[489p]

　　右末，取蟾酥搜作剂，丸如麦粒大。先刺疮口，次安一粒在疮口内，仍以水沉膏贴之；又以五七丸葱汤吞下，发汗即愈。
　　回疮蟾酥锭子　治疔疮毒气攻心欲死，以针刺其疮向心行处，但觉痛有血处下锭子。若累刺至心侧近皆不痛无血者，急针百会穴；痛有血者下锭子。若无血以亲人热血代之，犹十活三四。初发无有不效。大抵疔疮生于胸背头项最急，初生痛痒不常，中陷如钉，撼之有根，壮热恶心是也。　　南星　(艹款)冬花　巴豆仁　黄丹　白信各一钱　独活五分　螌蝥去头足，十个　　右为极细末，用新蟾酥和药如黍米大，捻作锭子。每遇疔疮，先以针刺其疮，必不知痛，有血出者，下锭子；如觉痛，不须再用。若更不知痛，再随疮所行处，迎夺刺之，至有血知痛即止。其原疮亦觉疼痛，以膏药贴之，脓出自瘥。用锭子法度，以银作细筒子一个，约长三寸许，随针下至疮痛处，复以细银丝子内药于筒内，推至痛处。
　　化毒丸　治内疔。[490p]

Take toad fat and prepare it into pills about the size of wheat grains. First, puncture the sore, then place one pill inside the wound, and cover it with a medicated paste. Also, swallow five to seven pills with scallion soup; sweating will lead to recovery.

Toad fat pill for treating boils and abscesses: if toxic qi attacks the heart causing a near-fatal condition, use a needle to pierce the sore directed towards the heart. If pain is felt and blood comes out, insert the pill. If successive punctures near the heart side cause no pain or bleeding, urgently needle the Baihui point. If there is pain and blood, insert the pill. If there is no blood, use the hot blood of a loved one as a substitute; it is still effective in three out of ten cases. Initially, when it appears, there are no failures. Generally, boils most severely arise on the chest, back, and head. Initially, they itch and hurt intermittently, sink like a nail, and have a root that makes it feel like it is shaking. Severe heat and aversion to food accompany them.

Ingredients include: southern star (dried plant), winter flower, castor bean seeds, yellow cinnabar, and white arsenic, each one penny; five parts of angelica; ten centipedes with heads and legs removed. These should be ground into a very fine powder, mixed with fresh toad fat to form balls the size of millet grains. Each time a boil appears, first use a needle to pierce it, ensuring no pain is felt. If blood comes out, insert the pill; if pain is felt, there is no need to use it again. If still no pain is felt, continue to poke along the path of the sore until blood is seen to indicate pain, then stop. The original sore will also ache; apply a medicated plaster to have pus drain naturally.

For the pill method, use a fine silver tube about three inches long; puncture down to the painful area of the sore with the needle, then push the medicine contained in a fine silver wire within the tube to the painful location.

Detoxicating pill treats internal boils.[490p]

　　朱砂　雄黄各一钱　蝉蜕十枚　硼砂生　轻粉各五分　麝香一分　片脑半分　　右末，蟾酥为丸菉豆大，每用一丸，舌上含化取涎，化后以井水漱净。无此丸，用单蟾酥代之亦可。古今图书集成医部全录卷三百六十六

外科痈疽疔毒门

　　　　单方

　　远志酒：治一切痈疽、发背、疖毒恶候，渍有死血，阴毒在中则不痛，敷之即痛；有忧怒等气积而内攻，则痛不可忍，敷之即不痛；或蕴血在内热逼人，手不可近，敷之必清凉；或气虚血冷，溃而不敛，若七情内郁，治之必愈。远志，不以多少，泔浸，捶去心，晒干为末，酒一盏，调末三钱，澄清饮之，以滓敷于患处。
　　忍冬藤酒：治食膏粱炙煿过多及服金石补药日久发疽。预服免患。忍冬藤鲜者五两，干者一两，大甘草节一两，作一剂，用水三锺，煎至二锺，入无灰好酒一锺，再煎十余沸，去渣，分三次服，能饮酒者一次服。另取藤捣烂，酒调涂患处，中留头出毒，干再搽。一方无甘草节。[491p]

Cinnabar and realgar, each one qian; ten pieces of cicada slough; five fen each of borax and light powder; one fen of musk; half a fen of powdered musk. Grind these ingredients into a fine powder. Use to form pills the size of broad beans. Take one pill, place it on the tongue until it melts, then rinse the mouth with well water. If these pills are not available, single toad venom can be substituted. This is from the Complete Compendium of Medicine, Volume 366, Section on Surgery for Abscesses and Poisonous Sores.

Single prescription:

Yuan Zhi Wine: Treats all abscesses, carbuncles, and toxic boils. If there is stagnation due to dead blood, it will not be painful unless applied; if internal evil is present, then pain will be unbearable, but applying will relieve it; if blood is congested within, causing internal heat that feels oppressive, the hand cannot approach; applying will surely bring relief. If there is deficiency of qi and cold blood, leading to ulceration that does not close, or if emotional distress is accumulated internally, the remedy will cure it. Yuan Zhi is used without regard to amount; soak, pound to a pulp, and dry to a powder. Mix three qian of this powder with one cup of wine, strain, and drink it, applying the residue to the affected area.

Lonicera Vine Wine: Treats injuries from consuming rich foods or excessive hot substances, and sores caused by long-term use of mineral supplements. It can be taken preventively. For fresh Lonicera vine, five liang; for dried, one liang; one liang of licorice root segments; prepare one dose with three ghouls of water, boil down to two ghouls, then add one cup of good quality wine without ash, boil again for over ten bubbles, strain the residue, and divide into three doses for consumption. For those who can drink alcohol, take it all at once. Additionally, take the vine, crush it, and mix with wine to apply to the affected area; leave it while the toxin is expelled, then reapply after it dries. An alternate method does not include licorice segments.[491p]

　　槐花酒：治发背一切疮毒，不问已成未成，但焮痛者并治之。槐花四五两微炒黄，乘热入酒二锺，煎十余沸，去渣热服，未成者二三服，已成者一二服。
　　痈疽疮肿：用金针散。皂角针，春取，一半新采，一半黑者，一味不拘多少，晒干为末，食后酒调二三钱服。
　　痈疽肿痛无头：用贝母、穿山甲、天花粉共为末，每服三钱，水二锺，煎半锺，一日四服，其毒自在大小便下矣。可与前方合为一贴。
